loans.name: Sebastian

texts.en:
Sebastian lives with his partner and their daughter in the village of Chacupe Alto in the district of La Victoria. Sebastian is 25 years old. The area of his village is small and rural. The majority of the residents manage small farms, raising cattle or birds. Sebastian’s home has electricity and also access to water, which is harvested from a local well.

During the day Sebastian is a field laborer. He has been working in various agricultural activities for over 15 years. In the afternoon, Sebastian drives a moto-taxi in the area, carrying passengers to and from work, stores or other locations. This moto-taxi is owned by his father; he rents it from him for a reasonable fee.

Recently, Sebastian has contracted to rent half a hectare of land in order to plant camote (a type of sweet potato). He is requesting this loan in order to purchase seeds, fertilizer, urea and other inputs for the production of the crop. He hopes that this planting will provide a good profit for his family and further supplement their needs. He is proud to be raising his own crops and building his own capital.

loans.use: Buy seed, fertilizer and other products to plant camote (sweet potato)

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando tiene 47 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Vive junto a su familia en el sector Guaraguaos del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona ubicada en la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, a más de tres horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado ovino, el los cría alimentándolos con granos y pastos naturales. Una vez que tienen el peso y tamaño óptimo los comercializa vivos o sacrificados. Adicionalmente cuenta con una pequeña parcela de cultivo donde suele sembrar mango y limón.

Fernando desea mejorar su negocio de crianza y comercialización adquiriendo alimento balanceado con el cual sus animales puedan desarrollarse de mejor manera y brindarle más ingresos al momento de venderlos. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Fernando es un padre bastante tranquilo y responsable. Las personas que le conocen le consideran alguien honesto y de confianza.
texts.en:
Fernando is 47 years old, married, and has two children. He lives with his family in the Guaraguaos sector of the agricultural district of Tambogrande, an area located in the province of Piura, in the region of the same name, more than three and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

He breeds and sells sheep by feeding them with grains and natural grasses. As soon as they have the optimum weight and size, he sells them alive or slaughtered. Additionally, he has a small parcel of harvest land where he sows mango and lemon. Fernando wishes to improve his business of breeding and selling, by purchasing animal feed, with which his animals can develop in a better way and offer him more income at the moment of selling them. For this reason, he would like to request a loan of 1500 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa for the first time.

Fernando is a calm and responsible father. The people that know him consider him honest and trustworthy.

loans.use: To buy animal feed to improve his business of breeding and selling animals.

loans.name: Julia Del Carmen

texts.es: Julia del Carmen tiene una pulpería. Hace más de 16 años que tiene este negocio. No es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues han sido de gran ayuda para su negocio para aumentar su inventario. Siempre le ha gustado trabajar y esta forma de realizarlo es su mejor forma. Actualmente solicita este crédito para la compra de granos básicos, detergentes, gaseosas y productos lácteos.  Pues la ubicación de su negocio es en su vivienda que ha logrado obtener una gran variedad de clientes.
texts.en: Julia del Carmen has a small grocery store.  She has had this business for more than 16 years.  This isn't the first time that she has asked for financing.  It has been a great help to her business so she could increase her inventory.  She has always liked to work, and this is her best way to do it.  She is currently requesting a loan to buy basic grains, detergent, soft drinks, and dairy products.  Her business is located in her home, and she has managed to obtain a large variety of customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Mirla Annali

texts.es:
Mirla tiene 25 años de edad, es casada y vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos en el sector Tongorrape del distrito de Motupe, ubicado a hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Desde hace un año ha instalado en su vivienda una pequeña bodega con la que ayuda a solventar la economía de su hogar. Allí ella ofrece a sus vecinos diversos productos de primera necesidad así como abarrotes y golosinas. Su esposo trabaja como profesor en un colegio de la zona y juntos sacan adelante a sus hijos.

Mirla ya ha trabajado anteriormente con un préstamo financiado por el Fondo Kiva a través de Edpyme Alternativa. En aquella oportunidad  ella deseaba ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos
y gracias al crédito obtenido pudo lograr su objetivo. Actualmente desea seguir implementando su negocio gracias a la demanda que cada día crece más. Por ello se encuentra solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Mirla sigue trabajando para llegar a lograr su más grande anhelo: ver convertidos a sus hijos en unos profesionales de éxito. Ella se encuentra muy agradecida con las personas que colaboraron con ella a través del programa Kiva.
texts.en:
Mirla is 25 and married. She lives with her husband and two children in the Tongorrape area in the district of Motupe, which is an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

She has had a small grocery store in her home for a year.  This business helps with her home's finances.  She offers her neighbors various basic products like groceries and candy.  Her husband works as a teacher at the high school in the area, and together they take good care of their children.

Mirla has worked previously with a loan financed by Kiva through Edpyme Alternativa.  On that occasion, she was hoping to expand her business and to buy more products, and thanks to the loan, she was able to accomplish her objective.  She currently hopes to keep implementing her business thanks to the demand that is growing every day.  This is why she is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa fo 1,000 PEN

Mirla keeps working to reach her biggest dream:  to see her children become successful professionals.  She is very grateful to the people who collaborate with her through Kiva.

loans.use: To keep implementing her business thanks to her demand that is growing every day

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
La  señora Dora B., es casada,tiene casa propia, propietaria de una despensa en su propio domicilio cuenta con clientela bien formada, con buen ingreso mensual, posee buenas referencias comerciales y personales.
Según ella que empezo con un pequeño copetin vendiendo empanada, sanwich, y bebidas en gral. Y ahora ya tiene una despensa bien surtida, agradece a la fundacion paraguaya por la ayuda que le brinda gracias a eso compra mas mercaderias para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, su sueño es tener un local comercial mas amplia para obtener mas clientes asi aumentar sus ingresos mensuales. La señora es una persona que se esmera para salir adelante es muy trabajadora y muy responsable.  
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de  mercaderias para su despensa, especialmente azucar y harina, ya que son los productos   mas consumidos por los clientes, y tambien quiere comprar golosinas en general.
texts.en:
Señora Dora B. is from Guayaybi, is married, and has her own home.  She owns a grocery store in her home and has a well-formed customer base.  She makes a good monthly income and has good commercial and personal references.

She started with a small snack business selling empanadas, sandwiches, and drinks.  Now she has a well-supplied store.  She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the help they have given her.  Thanks to this, she has purchased more merchandise to satisfy her customers' needs.  Her dream is to have a larger location so she can attract more customers and increase her monthly income.  She is a person who strives to get ahead.  She is very hard-working and very responsible.

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for her business, especially sugar and flour, since these are the products her customers consume the most of.  She also wants to buy candy.

loans.use: To buy sugar and flour in 50 kilo sacks as well as candy

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María tiene 58 años, vive con sus 2 hijos en una casa alquilada. Desde hace más de 5 años se dedica a la venta de ropa y también cosméticos, las prendas de vestir los vende los fines de semana para lo cual viaja cada 15 días para  comprar su mercadería al por mayor y los demás días por lo general recorre de casa en casa para vender los cosméticos por catalogo que vende dejando a crédito el producto. Esta contenta por que ve que su negocio es muy rentable y más aun con la experiencia de los años que tiene le ha permitido superar cada vez sus metas por lo que desea seguir aumentando su capital de trabajo. Es su crédito número 22 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que la conocen como una persona responsable en sus pagos, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas muy solidarias, agradece aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita puesto que le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería como prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Maria is 58 years old. She lives with her two children in a rented house. For more than 5 years she has sold clothing and cosmetics. She sells the clothing items on weekends, so she travels every 15 days to buy her merchandise wholesale. The other days she generally goes from house to house to sell cosmetics by catalog. She sells them by leaving the products on credit. She is happy because she sees that her business is very profitable and even happier with the experience of these years, which has permitted her to surpass her goals every time. For this reason, she wants to continue increasing her working capital. This is loan number 22 for her at MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support, since they know that she is a person who is responsible with her payments. In addition, she is pleased to be part of her community bank because all the members are very united. She thanks the people who will be granters of the loan that she is applying for, since it will be very useful to her in the progress of her business. She will invest the loan in the purchase of merchandise such as articles of clothing.

loans.use: Stock more clothing to improve her sales.

loans.name: Susana Janet

texts.es:
Susana tiene 36 años de edad, es soltera y tiene una hija, vive en el sector Callanca del distrito de Monsefú, una zona conocida a nivel regional por sus festividades turísticas y religiosas. Se encuentra ubicada a más de veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos y avesde corral desde hace diez años. Ella cría sus animales en diversos ambientes ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y a los negociantes que siempre frecuentan la zona en donde vive. Con los ingresos que recibe de esta actividad ella se encarga de solventar sus gastos y sacar adelante a su menor hija.

Susana desea realizar algunas mejoras en sus corrales, asimismo desea adquirir algunos alimentos con los cuales planea mejorar la crianza de sus animales. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer luchadora, diariamente da lo mejor de si para sacar adelante a su menor hija. En la zona quienes la conocen la consideran una mujer honrada y confiable.
texts.en:
Susana is 36, single, and has one daughter.  She lives in the Callanca area in the district of Monsefú, an area known at the regional level for it's tourist and religious festivals.  It is located 20 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

She has raised and sold pigs and poultry for 10 years.  She raises her animals in different areas located behind her house.  When they have reached a good level of development, she sells them to her neighbors and the businesspeople that travel the area where she lives.  With the income she receives, she pays for her home's expenses and takes care of her young daughter.

Susana hopes to make some improvements to her pens and to acquire feed with which she plans to improve her animals' development.  This is why she thought it convenient to request her first loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 500 PEN, which which she plans to accomplish her goal.

She is a determined woman who gives her best every day to take good care of her young daughter.  People that know her in the area consider her an honorable and trustworthy woman.

loans.use: To improve her pens and to buy feed to improve her business of raising and selling animals

loans.name: Flor De Libertad 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Clara is the coordinator of her group Flor de Libertad 1 & 2 (Liberty Flower). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and their six children. They have raised and educated their children by working hard. Her most difficult challenge is to finish a university career. In the meantime, she plans to continue enjoying to read the Bible. She is part of the microfinance program because these loans are for business and she really likes that.

Clara is excited to be taking her first loan with Esperanza. She has had her business for around one month, starting with some savings she had. After she started was when she discovered the Esperanza program. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying clothing like 10 skirts, 10 pairs of pants, blouses and shirts. She will use the profits to save and to study. She is dreaming to have enough income to help her children in everything they need, especially in their studies.

This Esperanza associate's story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in Los Arcarrizos, a dusty, industrial area north of the capital where free-trade zones are common. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy 10 skirts, 10 pairs of pants, blouses and shirts

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La  Sra. Eva B. es de la ciudad de San Estanislao, del Barrio Tacuara, tiene 38 años de edad, esta casada con el Sr. Jose Dejesus Fernandez Colman, con 42 años de edad, Actualmente tienen 1 hijo menor.
 
       Posee una despensa en su domicilio particular, con clientela formada, buen ingreso, buenas referencias comerciales y personales, señora muy trabajadora, excelente cliente con nosotros y con otras entidades financieras.

             El cliente con este crédito va comprar mercaderías para la venta como fideos, azucar, harina, aceite, panificado, lacteos.
texts.en:
Señora. Eva B. is from the city of San Estanislao in the Tacuara neighborhood.  She is 38 and is married to señor Jose De Jesus Fernandez Colman, who is 42.  They currently have 1 young son.

She has a grocery store in her home and a well-formed customer base.  She makes a good income and has good business and personal references.  She is a hard-working woman and an excellent client with our organization and with other financial institutions.

With this loan, she is going to buy merchandise to sell like noodles, sugar, flour, oil, bread, and dairy products.

loans.use: To buy noodles, sugar, flour, oil, bread, and dairy products.

loans.name: Elsi Dolores

texts.es:
Elsi de 53 años, tiene un pequeño taller de confección de ropa en su casa. vive en Primavera de Duran (zona periurbana, con una ecología en disolución a las afuera de Guayaquil). 

A Elsi desde pequeña siempre le gusto coser por eso decidió que para tener dinero y ayudar con los gastos familiares necesitaba tener su propio negocio de costura y confección. Desde ese tiempo hasta ahora ha venido trabajando en una parte de su casa con su maquina de coser. Confeccionando y cociendo ropa es que ha podido incrementar su clientela, trabaja desde las muy temprano hasta la hora que termine todos los pedidos.  

Con el préstamo quiere comprar cemento, bloques y fierros para tener su casa mas ubicada con el taller de confección. En el futuro quiere construir la segunda plata de su casa y poder comprar un carro.
texts.en:
Elsi is 53 years old. She has a small dressmaking business in her home. She lives in the “Primavera de Duran” Zone, a semirural suburb on the outskirts of Guayaquil. 
Since she was little, Elsi has always liked to sew. This is why she decided to start a sewing and dressmaking business in order to earn money and help with the family expenses. Since this time she has been working in a part of her house with her sewing machine. By constructing and sewing clothes she has been able to grow her customer base. She works from early in the morning until she fills all her customer’s orders. With this loan she will buy cement, blocks and iron in order to have a home with a better sewing workshop. In the future she would like to add a second floor to her home and buy a car.

loans.use: cement, blocks and iron

loans.name: Modesto Efrain

texts.es:
Modesto  de 33 años de edad, vive con su esposa quien se encarga de cuidar a su niña de 8 meses y de los quehaceres del hogar; el Sr. B. F.  labora como conductor desde hace 6 años para el ceta INATEC en la colonia Yolaina a 15 km de Nueva Guinea, ademas es taxista en el turno de la noche, sabado y Domingo; ya que en INATEC trabaja de lunes a viernes, por lo que cuenta con estos otros ingresos.  

Este prestamo lo requiere para construir una habitación  y asi tener mejor comodidad  en el hogar. 

Su mayor sueño en la vida es tener estabilidad laboral y darle lo mejor a su familia y mejorar poco a poco su vivienda para lograr mayor comodidad de vida.
texts.en:
Modesto is 33 years old and married. His wife is in charge of looking after their eight month old daughter and handling the household chores. Sr. Modesto has worked the past six years as a driver for INATEC (the National Technological Institute) in the district of Yolaina, which 15 kilometers outside of Nueva Guinea. In addition he works as a taxi driver at night and on Saturdays and Sundays. He works for INATEC from Monday to Friday, so he needs the additional income.

This loan will be used to build a room so that his home will be more comfortable. His greatest wish in life is to have job stability, provide the best for his family, and gradually improve his home so that they will be more comfortable.

loans.use: Add a room to his house

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
La  señora Felicita Z., es de la Ciudad de  San Esatnislao Barrio 3 Tapiracuai, es soltera vive con sus padres, es propietaria de una despensa bien surtida con clientela bien formada con buenos ingresos mensuales, es una persona joven que se esfuerza para salir adelante, gracias a los creditos que la fundacion le otorga esta realizando sus sueños en realidades, según ella comenzo con un pequeño copetin ventas de bebidas en gral., ahora ya tiene una despensa en su propio domicilio, su sueño es tener un local comercial mas amplio para poder cargar mas y tener mas rentabilidad. 
El cliente esta muy contenta y satisfecho con la ayuda  que le brinda la Fundacion Paraguaya gracias a eso trabaja con mucha tranquilidad y paga sus cuotas en forma exelente. 
En esta occasion solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercaderías para su despensa y tambien por que quiere hacer algunas mejoras en su casa ya que quiere hermosear su vivienda por fin de año.
texts.en:
Mrs. Felicita lives in the city of San Esatnislao, Tapiracuai. She is single and lives with her parents. She runs a grocery store that has a variety of supplies and a good customer base. She has good monthly earnings from this business. She is a young person with a strong desire to succeed. Thanks to the loan that the foundation provided, her dreams are becoming a reality. According to Felicita, she started her business with only an outlet where she sold drinks. Now she has a grocery store in her own house. Her dream is to have a larger, commercial location where she can have a larger store and greater earnings
She is happy and satisfied with the help she is given from the Paraquay Foundation. She is thankful for the security provided by the foundation and she always pays her payments on time. 
She is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise for her store. She would also like to make some improvements to her house, as she would like her house to look more beautiful before the end of the year.

loans.use: She will buy merchandise for her grocery store and pay for workmen to help renovate her home.

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
María es madre de cuatro hijos, trabajadora de 57 años de edad, mujer muy esforzada por apoyar  a su familia.
Hoy en día se dedica a trabajar en servicios domestico para ganarse el pan de cada día. Su mayor anhelo ha sido tener una vivienda en buenas condiciones de concreto, pero se le ha hecho difícil. Ya que su condición económica es de muy poco recursos.
Atreves del financiamiento ha venido comprando materiales de construcción en donde tiene: piedra, perlines, hierro. Poco a poco ha venido comprando ya que no ha podido comenzar por que su financiamiento es de poco, y no ha logrado los materiales completos para comenzar la obra.
Comprara: un quintal de hierro, cien bloques, ocho bolsa de cemento, un metro de arena y piedrín. Y comenzar. Contenta ya que lo está logrando, siendo Afodenic una puerta para lograr una mejor vivienda.
texts.en: María is a mother of four, a hardworking, courageous 57-year-old woman helping her family. She currently works in domestic services to earn her daily bread. Her main goal has been to have a concrete home in good condition, but this has been difficult since she has very few economic resources. With her finances, she has been buying construction materials like stone, beams, and iron. She has been shopping little by little with the small amount of money she has, as she has not been able to buy all the materials to start the work. She will buy 100 lbs of iron, 100 bricks, eight bags of cement, a meter of sand, and gravel, and she will begin the work. She is happy with what she has accomplished, with Afodenic being the door to a better home.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to improve her concrete house and be able to enjoy a dignified home

loans.name: Marcos Roberto

texts.es:
Marcos es un hombre dedicado al trabajo, casado, muy esforzado por el bienestar de su familia.
Su trabajo es de cadete. Donde cada día brinda su servicio, lleva varios años, siendo de unidad propia. El cual compro con su liquidación anterior de su trabajo.
Las mejoras de su vivienda la ha venido logrado atreves de los financiamiento de Afodenic, en donde con el crédito anterior logro levantar la pared de concreto de enfrente y cerrar bien como porche y puerta de metal. Ahora quiere poner piso ya que es de tierra y desea hacer esta mejora para estar cómodo con su familia y lograr mejor higiene.
texts.en:
Marcos is a married man who is dedicated to his work. He fights for the well-being of his family. Marcos works as a taxi driver and provides his services every day. He has been in this position for several years and operates his own vehicle which he bought using the severance pay from his previous job.

The improvements to his home have been achieved with the help of financing from AFODENIC. His previous loan was used to build a concrete wall at the front of his house, enclose a porch, and install a metal door. Marcos now wants to lay down a floor over the dirt, which will make his family more comfortable and provide healthier living conditions.

loans.use: Purchase materials to lay down a floor in his house

loans.name: Nueva Vida Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Nueva Vida”, es la 2º vez que se publica en el sitio de Kiva. Se conforma de 17 socios pertenecientes a la ciudad de Curicó. Sus principales negocios son de venta de ropa, leña, comida rápida, joyas; producción y venta de muebles y almacenes. 
Claudia, quien en la foto se encuentra en 1º fila, sentada en 4º lugar de izquierda a derecha, vende ropa de niño y adulto y artículos de loza para el hogar, hace 5 años, en 3 diferentes ferias de su comuna. Trabaja todos los viernes, sábados y domingos en la feria y en su casa o a domicilio los otros días. Además hace 1 mes que vende ensaladas preparadas en un almacén. Este negocio se lo ofreció una compañera de grupo, ya que ella misma no tenía el tiempo de vender en ese almacén. 
Con este préstamo comprará ropa de primavera- verano, loza y verduras para seguir con la venta de ensaladas. Su sueño es tener un bazar con variados productos y un servicio en el que las personas del barrio puedan pagar cuentas. Tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 2 años, quienes quedan al cuidado de su mamá o una vecina de confianza, cuando Claudia está trabajando. 
A Claudia le ha sido muy grato trabajar con Fondo Esperanza, ya que ha podido sociabilizar con sus compañeros durante las reuniones, además de aprender conceptos de negocios. 
Curicó se ubica en la región del Maule, zona centro del país. El clima de Curicó es de tipo mediterráneo y es considerado como uno de los más agradables del país. Se caracteriza además por su cultura en torno al vino y sus alrededores de una belleza mágicamente natural.  A pesar que la fuerza de trabajo se ha  incrementado, esta región sigue siendo, según el último censo, una de las más pobres del país.
texts.en:
For the communal bank “Nueva Vida” (New Life), it is the second time that they have been on the Kiva website. It is made up of 17 members who live in the city of Curicó. Their key businesses are selling clothes, firewood, fast food, jewelry; manufacture and sale of furniture and grocery stores. 
Claudia, who in the photo is in the 1st row, sitting 4th place from left to right, has sold children's and adult clothing and pieces of crockery for the home for 5 years, in 3 different markets in her town. She works every Friday, Saturday and Sunday at the market and at her home on the other days. In addition for the last month she has sold prepared salads at a grocery store. This business was offered to her by a member in the group, as she did not have the time herself to sell at this store. 
With this loan she will buy spring-summer clothing, crockery and greens to continue selling salads. Her dream is to have a bazaar with various products and a service where people of the neighborhood can pay billls. She has 2 children who are 3 and 2, who are looked after by her mother or a  trusted neighbor, when Claudia is working. 
Claudia has found it very pleasant to work with Fondo Esperanza, as she has been able to socialize with her fellow members during the meetings, as well as learning business concepts. 
Curicó is located in the Maule region, a central area of the country. Curicó's climate is like the Mediterranean and is considered one of the most pleasant in the country. It is characterized as well by its culture around wine and its surrounding area has a magically natural beauty.  Despite the work effort increasing, this region continues to be, according to the latest census, one of the poorest in the country.

loans.use: Merchandise: clothes, crockery and greens.

loans.name: La Primavera Group

texts.es:
El comité “La PrimaV.” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de San Estanislao en la zona de Bertoni Calle San Blas . Todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, como son las ventas, fabrica de carbón, cría de animales,  etc.
Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
 Este comité está empezando con el primer  ciclo, con muchas ganas de sobresalir adelante con este grupo.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Leopoldina quien se dedica a la cría de animales, especialmente gallinas ponedoras, así ella vende huevos diariamente en el negocio que tiene en su casa.
También tiene cría de pollos s que una vez que estén listos o con el peso ideal para la venta ella ofrece a sus clientes y estos le dejan buena ganancia. 
Ella trabaja mucho para atender todas las actividades que tiene en su casa ya que tiene diversos como sus animales, su negocio, sus hijos y su casa, pero se encuentra muy satisfecha con todo ya que nos comenta que se siente realizada haciendo todas las actividades.
Quiere continuar y mejorar en cuanto a cría de pollos y gallinas para lo que solicita el préstamo.
texts.en:
The “La PrimaV.” committee was formed with the union of several residents of the city of San Estanislao in the Bertoni Calle San Blas area. All of the members of the committee have different independent activities, such as sales, manufacturing charcoal, raising animals, etc. The members formed a very close group capable of undertaking activities together that strengthen their unity. 

This committee is starting its first cycle and is very eager to get ahead with this group. One of the members is Leopoldina, who works raising animals, especially laying hens. She sells eggs everyday in the business she has at her house.  She also raisies chickens that, once they are ready or at the ideal weight for sale, she offers to her customers and this leaves here with a good profit. 
 
She works a lot to attend to all of the activities she has at home since they are very diverse: her animals, her business, her children and her house. But she is very satisfied with everything and she tells us that she feels fulfilled with all of her activities. She wants to continue and improve with raising the chickens and the hens and that is why she is asking for the loan.

loans.use: To purchase balanced feed and other materials.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
La  Sra. Patricia P. es de la ciudad de San Estanislao, del Barrio Republicano, tiene 49 años de edad, es casada, con 4 hijos todos mayores de edad.
 
       Se dedica en la producción y venta de leche, con clientela formada, buen ingreso, buenas referencias comerciales y personales, señora muy trabajadora, excelente cliente con nosotros y con otras entidades financieras.

             El cliente con este crédito va comprar 1 lechera para producir mejor y asi tener mejor ingreso.
texts.en:
Mrs. Patricia P. is from the city of San Estanislao, of the Republicano neighborhood. She is 49 years old, married and has 4 grown children. 
 
She works in the production and sale of milk, with a steady clientele, a good income, and good business and personal references. She is a very hardworking woman who is an excellent client of ours and of other financial entities. 

With this loan, the client will buy 1 dairy cow for better prodution and thus better income.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Maria Elena tiene la edad de 24 años, es casada, y tiene 2 hijos de 1 y otro de 4 meses de edad que son su mayor prioridad. Ella quiere comprar 2 vacas para engordar. Cuenta con el terreno con pasto para el cuido de los animales por lo cuál invirtirá en la compra de animales para tener una ayuda extra. Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer. Desea llegar a obtener una buena ganancia de los animales comprados para tener una ayuda extra en momentos deficiles. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR y esta muy contenta con las facilidades que se le brindaron. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productora.
texts.en:
Maria Elena is 24 years old, married, and has 2 children.  One is a year old, the other 3 months old, and they are her top priority.  She would like to buy 2 cows to fatten.  She has land with grass for tending to animals, which is an extra help.  She has dedicated herself to her farm for several years, and would like to expand.  She would like to get to earning a good profit from her purchased animals, so that she has support in tough times.

This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR, and she is very happy to have the opportunity they provide for her. In the future, she would like to provide a higher standard of living and more financial stability for her family.  She would also like to continue growing both as a person and producer.

loans.use: To purchase livestock.

loans.name: Trinidad Lisette

texts.es: Trinidad Lisette se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi. Hace más de 4 años, que tiene este negocio. Ella es una persona responsable que disfruta de realizar este tipo de actividad, pues sabe que tiene que mantener a su familia y sufragar sus gastos. Todos los días se levanta temprano desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, cuando el inicio fue por su esposo, quien le había enseñado este medio de vida, pues actualmente  no tenía un medio de ingreso. Este crédito es para la compra de repuestos y ciertas reparaciones. Sueña con lograr comprarse otro vehículo para aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Trinidad Lisettte dedicates herself to providing a taxi service.  She has had the business for more than 4 years.  She is a responsible person who enjoys carrying out this type of activity, since she knows she has to support her family and cover her expenses.  Every day, she rises early at 6 in the morning until 9 at night.  Her husband got her started by showing her this way of making a living when there was no source of income.  This loan is for the purchase of replacement parts and to pay for certain repairs.  She dreams of purchasing another vehicle in order to augment her earnings.

loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita tiene 61 años, vive con su esposo y con el menor D. sus 6 hijos en su casa propia. DesD. hace 11 años venD. artículos D. ferretería así como artículos viejos D. fierro, siendo su puesto D. venta, el patio D. su casa, ya que por estar ubicada dentro D. una zona comercial le da mucha ventaja con los ingresos económicos. Los días que más trabajo tiene son los fines D. semana, en donD. sus hijos la ayudan a vender la mercadería, ya que en su mayoría son muy pesados. Es así que sus ventas se han mantenido estable a lo largo D. estos años, ahora lo que anhela es dedicarse a un negocio más ligero como es la venta D.  comida. Es su crédito número 15 que tiene con MFP, esta muy contenta D. saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además  le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, asimismo agradece a todas las personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será muy útil en el progreso D. su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra D. mercadería, así como D. algunos materiales D. construcción para restaurar la parte frontal D. su casa que será su puesto D. venta.
texts.en:
Margarita is 61 years old, and lives with her husband and the youngest of her 6 children in a house they own.  For the past 11 years, she has sold hardware items such as old metal parts.  She sells her merchandise from the patio of her house that, because it is located in a busy commercial zone, is very advantageous for generating income.  Her busiest days are on weekends, during which her children help her sell merchandise since most of it is very heavy.  With this work, her sales have remained stable over these years.  She now wants to dedicate herself to a lighter business, such as selling food. 

This is credit number 15 that she has with MFP, and she is very happy to know she has some financial support.  In addition, she enjoys being part of her cooperative bank because all the members are very responsible and united people.  Likewise, she gives thanks to all the people that might contribute toward this loan for her, as it will be very useful to her in the progress of her business.

She will invest the loan she is requesting into the purchase of merchandise, such as some construction supplies to restore the front part of her house that will be a sales stand.

loans.use: To supply her hardware store, and buy construction materials to improve her sales stand.

loans.name: San Francisca Group

texts.es:
Este comité se formó mediante el esfuerzo de las vecinas que decidieron unirse para el comité.
Todas la señoras de este comité realizan actividades independientes y de esta manera están comienzan ayudar a sus familias y logran mejorar sus ingresos.
Una de las integrantes y quien manifestó estar muy contenta con el comité es la señora Martina, quien se dedica a la  cría de animales.
Además comenta que entre todas se ayudan y se esfuerzan el doble para mejorar sus trabajos, y que esto es muy importante para ellas ya que las capacitaciones como el crédito son un gran incentivo para continuar con las actividades.
Ella de este modo solicita el préstamo para la mejora de producción de animales, tiene varios proyectos como la compra de balanceados y tejidos.
texts.en: This group was formed through the efforts of neighbors who decided to unite for the committee.  All the women in this group carry out independent activities and, in this way, start to help their families improve their income.  One of the members who stated that she was very happy with the group was Martina, who dedicates herself to raising farm animals.  In addition, she comments that the members all help each other and work twice as hard to improve their businesses.  This is very important for them, since support such as the loan is a great incentive to continue with their activities.  She requests the loan via this means to improve her livestock enterprise, and she has various projects such as the purchase of balances and mesh.

loans.use: To purchase balances and mesh.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.es: Estrella tiene 50 años, vive con sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Desde hace 19 años vende carne en las ferias comerciales de las zonas rurales de su ciudad, siendo la carne de cerdos y oveja que más vende. Sus ventas lo realizan de manera Inter diaria, por el cual cuenta con dos puestos fijos en distintos lugares de su ciudad. Estrella ha visto que este negocio le ha sido muy rentable, ya que la demanda de este producto va en aumento; es por esta razón que desea tener más capital de trabajo. Este es su crédito número 21 con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son muy solidarios. Asimismo agradece aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita ya que le será muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más animales para vender su carne.
texts.en:
Estrella is 50 years old and lives with her 2 children in her own house.  For the past 19 years, she has been selling meat at the commercial markets in the rural zones of her city.  She mostly sells pork and sheep meat.  She sells during the day, for which she counts on two set locations in different places in the city.  This business has been very profitable for Estrella, as demand for her product is increasing; this is the reason why she would like to obtain more working capital.

This is her 21st credit with MFP, and she is very glad to know that she has financial assistance.  She also is glad to be part of a cooperative bank because all the members are very supportive.  Likewise, she thanks those people who might be part of granting this loan, as it will be very useful in helping her business to progress.  She would like to use the loan to buy more animals.

loans.use: To purchase more animals.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Manuel Antonio es un padre de familia de 44 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus hijos. Se dedica desde hace 20 años a la venta de madera. Pues es una persona muy responsable. El dio inicio por su Padre ya que anteriormente él se dedicaba al negocio, con el paso del tiempo fue que decide que su hijo Manuel se haga cargo del negocio.  Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a un crédito que piensa invertir en la compra de madera para comercializarle pues actualmente tiene bastantes pedidos.Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y confianza.
texts.en:
Manuel Antonio is a 44 year old father who lives with his wife and children. He has been selling wood for 20 years. Manuel is a very responsible person and started in this business since his father was previously in the same line of work. Eventually Manuel’s father decided that he should take over the business.

Manuel is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of wood to sell since he has enough orders. His greatest wish is to grow his business so that he can improve the quality of life for his family. The people who know Manuel have great respect and confidence in him.

loans.use: Purchase wood to sell

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo, de 55 años, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposa Carmen de 47 años, y de 2 de sus 4 hijos, pues los mayores trabajan y son independientes. Cada día es de lucha constante para este trabajador hombre, pues desde muy joven quiso brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Desde hace 20 años, se dedica a brindar el servicio de transporte, es chofer para diversas empresas de transporte público y  afirma que el trabajo es tedioso pues maneja 15 horas diarias sin interrupción durante 5 días a la semana y solo descansa 2 días. Se esfuerza por brindarle a su familia una buena calidad de vida con las ganancias de su trabajo y le  entretiene pasear por las calles cubriendo la ruta de su zona. Durante sus ratos libres ayuda a su esposa en la atención de su pequeña tienda de comestibles que tiene en su casa. Como es un hombre muy emprendedor para el futuro quiere mejorar el negocio de su esposa para que crezca y obtengan mejores ganancias que las actuales. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este préstamo que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso; ya que le gusta el trabajo con su grupo pues todos los integrantes son muy responsables y solidarios. Lorenzo tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería que necesita su esposa para surtir mejor su tienda, de esta manera espera mejorar sus ganancias y continuar adelante.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, age 55, lives in his own home with his wife Carmen, age 47, and two of their four children. The older children work and are independent. Each day is a struggle for this hardworking gentleman. From a young age, he has tried to provide the best for his family. For the past 20 years, Lorenzo has been providing transportation services as a driver for different public transportation companies. He says the work is tedious since he drives continuously 15 hours each day. Lorenzo works five days a week and only has two days of rest. He strives to provide his family with a good quality of life with the earnings from his job driving through the streets that make up his local route. During his free time, Lorenzo helps his wife manage her small grocery store located in their house. Being a very enterprising gentleman, he wants to improve his wife’s business so that they can generate more income than what they earn today.

This is his first loan with MFP. Lorenzo promises to submit his payments on time because he does not want to disappoint the people who made this loan possible so that he can continue working and making progress. He enjoys working with his Communal Bank since all of the members are responsible and supportive of one another. Lorenzo plans to invest the loan he requested in the purchase of merchandise his wife needs to restock her store in hopes of improving their income and continue moving forward.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise to restock his wife's store

loans.name: Alba Maria

texts.es: Alba Maria  tiene 47 años y tiene 2 hijos menores de edad. La señora se dedica a una pulpería. Por lo que es una madre muy responsable y quería que sus hijos obtuvieran la oportunidad de estudiar. Por lo que desde la edad de 8 años Alba inicio este negocio, ella con el poco capital que obtenía por medio de su esposo logro ahorrar algo de dinero, por lo anteriormente ella se dedica a la venta de poco productos. Ella tenía que buscar el medio de sobrevivir con sus hijos y su familia. Y así ella no se rindió y ahora tiene este negocio. En la actualidad solicita este financiamiento que será invertido en la compra de mercancías para aprovechar el incremento de las ventas en los meses venideros. Su sueño es crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Alba Maria is 47 years old, has two young children, and manages a general store. She is a very responsible mother who wants her children to have the opportunity to study. Alba has been working in this type of business since she was eight years old. With the little amount of money she obtained from her husband, she was able to build up some savings and began selling a few products so that her children and family could survive. She gave up that activity before starting her current business.

Alba is currently requesting this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of merchandise. This will enable her to take advantage of the increase in sales within the coming months. Her dream is to grow her business.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
Este Grupo se formo atrvez de la Sra. Luisa C., le invito  a sus vecinas para formar un comité. 
Cada una de las integrantes realiza actividades dependiendo de las facilidades con que cuetan y de las herramientas con cuentan para sus emprendimientos.
De esta manera una de las integrantes es la señora Eusebia docente y se ha integrado al comité y quiere comenzar con una actividad que le genera ingreso extra a la actividad que ella realiza.
Solicita el prestamo para la compra de ropas y calzados que estaria vendiendo en un comienzo en sus tiempos libres y mas adelante si el negocio resulta desea abrir un salon para exponer sus mercaderias.
texts.en:
This group was started by Sra. Luisa C. who invited her neighbors to form a committee. The members engage in activities based on their skill sets and have the equipment needed to run their businesses.

One of the members is Sra. Eusebia, a teacher. She joined the committee and wants to start a business so that she can generate extra income. Eusebia is requesting a loan in order to buy clothing and shoes that she can sell in her spare time. Sometime later she hopes to open a boutique where she can display her merchandise.

loans.use: Purchase clothing & shoes

loans.name: Fe Y Amor 7 Group

texts.en:
Monette is the coordinator of her group Fe y Amor 7 (Faith and Love). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their four children. She said her most difficult challenge is to work in a foreign country. In the meantime, she plans to continue enjoying attending church and singing to the Lord.

Monette is excited to be taking her second loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for around six years, starting with her savings of $500. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying clothing like dozens of skirts, pants, shirts and shoes for women, men and children. She will use the profits to buy more products. She is dreaming to have more merchandise and improve her business

This Esperanza associate is one of a group formed by Haitian citizens who live in the Bateyes area around Romana's sugarcane field. Her story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian and Dominican clients, many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti. Her group is located in the rural areas surrounding La Romana, an area where the economy is dominated by sugarcane and upscale tourism. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas of the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

loans.use: To buy shoes, clothes, miscellaneous products

loans.name: Ana Rosa

texts.es: Ana Rosa se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Por lo que no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. Con mucho esfuerzo es que ha podido continuar con este negocio. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio,    se encuentra ubicado de manera ambulante, es la único forma en la puede obtener una variedad de cliente.  Cuenta con este negocio, el cual poco a poco ha ido sacando adelante, surtiéndolo con lo que ha sido posible para ella, ya que esto es bastante difícil, ya que la mayoría de las ganancias son destinadas a los gastos familiares. Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de productos, así mismo productos los cuales sean solicitados por sus clientes. Ella es alguien quien sueña con mejorar su condición económica, es por esto que espera mejorar mucho su negocio.
texts.en:
Ana Rosa sells general merchandise. This is not the first time she has utilized financing. With great effort she is able to continue with her business. Ana started her business more than three years ago, starting out as a street vendor since it was the only way for her to attract a variety of customers. By having this business, she was able to gradually move forward and acquire as much inventory as possible.

Since most of her earnings goes toward the family expenses, it can be difficult to make headway. Therefore, she is requesting a loan so that she can buy a large quantity of products that are requested by her customers. Ana dreams of improving her financial situation, which is why she hopes to make several more improvements to her business.

loans.use: Acquire a large quantity of merchandise

loans.name: Adelia

texts.en:
Adelia is a 42-year-old mother who lives with her family in Hatillo 7, located in the central valley of Costa Rica. She has a business selling cleaning products to car mechanics in her community. In order to meet her clients' demands, Adelia must maintain a certain level of merchandise in her inventory. One of her cousins allows her to use a storage space which is located near her clients, in order to store her cleaning products. Adelia hopes to use this loan to purchase various cleaning products which she plans to sell to mechanics. She says that the products she sells are top quality products in high demand.

The loan consultant who has been working with Adelia describes her as a hardworking entrepreneur with a fighting spirit who is dedicated to her business. Adelia has lupus, but she doesn´t let her illness prevent her from living a normal life. In general, Adelia carries out domestic tasks in the mornings: preparing breakfast and lunch, cleaning the house, etc. The afternoons are dedicated to her business: seeking new clients, collecting payments from existing clients and making sales. Adelia's goal is to one day work in a centralized location, a small store, where she could offer her clients various cleaning products. At the moment, the only factor standing in the way of progress is a lack of working capital. This loan will help to address this challenge.

loans.use: For the purchase of cleaning products

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.es: Rosenda, de 27 años, es el sostén de su familia; convive con Julián, de 31años, la pareja tiene 3 hijos, Wimbliaw, de 10, Yuritza, de 5 y, Danny, de 2 años de edad; como una gran familia, ellos viven en una casa alquilada en el centro poblado de “Santa Clara”. Todas las mañanas ella, organiza las actividades de la familia. Su esposo Julián, se interna varios días, a trabajar en la mina de su localidad. Por ello Rosenda, distribuye bien sus actividades: durante las mañanas, ella atiende a su pequeña pero abastecida tienda de comestibles, donde vende productos de primera necesidad a los pobladores de su localidad; y por las tardes se dirige a sus terrenos de cultivos, donde cuida sus sembríos de papa y arveja. Lleva 13 años dedicándose a la agricultura, en todo este tiempo pudo adquirir conocimiento y habilidad para sobrevivir de ello; “nunca dejare de cultivar”, afirma. Más adelante ella alquilará más terrenos de cultivo para sembrar más variedades de papa, y así poder vender en diferentes lugares del país y no solo 3 veces al año. Es el cuarto crédito con MFP y está muy contenta porqué ahora ya puede ahorrar y planear nuevos objetivos. Con el crédito que adquirirá, está pensando invertir en el arriendo de terrenos de cultivo y el pago del personal que trabajará en su nuevo proyecto; en el que piensa sembrar papa.
texts.en:
Rosenda, age 27, provides support for her family. She lives with her partner Julián, age 31, and has three children: Wimbliaw who is 10, Yuritza who is 5, and Danny who is 2 years old. Her family is large and they live in a rented house in the central village of Santa Clara. Every morning she organizes her family’s activities. Her husband Julián is away several days at his job at the local mine. For this reason, Rosenda manages her time well among her activities. In the mornings, she attends to her small but well-stocked grocery store where she sells basic necessities to the local villagers. In the afternoons, she looks after her farmland on which she grows potatoes and peas. Rosenda has been farming for 13 years and has acquired the knowledge and skills needed to survive in this type of work. “I’ve never stopped farming,” says Rosenda. Later on, she wants to rent more farmland so that she can grow more varieties of potatoes and be able to sell them in other parts of the country more often than just three times a year.

This is her fourth loan with MFP. Rosenda is very pleased because she can now save and set new goals. With the loan she acquired, she plans to invest in rented farmland and pay the workers who will carry out her new project in which she plans to plant more potatoes.

loans.use: Rent additional farmland and pay workers for growing more potatoes

loans.name: Adolfo William

texts.es: El señor C. M. labora en Explotec, en donde desempeña el cargo de Director de Operaciones en el cual con el salario que devenga mantiene a todo su núcleo familiar ya que lo conforma su esposa y un bebé que está en camino, en estos momentos solicita un crédito con CEPRODEL para pagar unos gastos personales que tuvo.
texts.en: C. M. is the Director of Operations at Explotec. With his salary he supports his family, which includes his wife and a baby on the way. He is requesting a loan from CEPRODEL to pay for some personal expenses.

loans.use: Personal expenses

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Doña Ángela tiene 55 años tiene tres hijos de los cuales uno es a quien ella ayuda en sus estudios actualmente su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general desde hace mas de 15 años que se dedica a este negocio. No es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues ha sido muy gratificante inicio por la  necesidad de obtener un poco mas de ingresos incrementado su capital de trabajo inicial. Ella se ha valido de esta actividad para poder solventar sus gastos familiares y sacar adelante a los suyos. Este financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como toallas, sabanas, cosméticos y calzado.
texts.en:
Doña Ángela is 55 years old and has three children, one of whom she is helping with his studies. She currently manages a store where she has been selling general merchandise for more than 15 years. This is not the first time she has requested financing. Ángela says she finds the loans very rewarding because they have helped her generate a little more income and boost her initial operating capital. Through her business, she has been able to meet her household expenses and move her family forward.

This loan will be used to buy merchandise such as towels, bed sheets, cosmetics, and shoes.

loans.use: Purchase towels, bed sheets, cosmetics, and shoes

loans.name: Veronica Patricia

texts.es: La señora Verónica tiene como principal actividad económica la venta a crédito de frazadas, colchas, cocinas, garrafas y víveres, ella comenzó con esta actividad hace cuatro años, en un principio vendía zapatos para señoras de pollera puesto que su familia se dedica a la fabricación de este producto, tiene una pequeña hija y su esposo se dedica a trabajos de albañilería, con esfuerzo pudieron comprar una mezcladora para así facilitar el trabajo del esposo, en primera instancia formó parte del Banco de Emprendimiento "LAS AMIGAS" demostrando responsabilidad con el cargo que desempeñaba ( Secretaria de Actas) y puntualidad en sus pagos. Viven en casa de sus padres y en un futuro piensan comprar su propio domicilio para dar comodidad a su pequeña hija, el destino del crédito es para incrementar su capital, comprando mercadería ya que tiene muchos pedidos, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Sra. Veronica’s primary business is selling blankets, bedspreads, stoves, tanks of natural gas, and groceries. She started her business four years ago by selling women’s shoes and traditional clothing that her family manufactured. Veronica has a young daughter and her husband works as a mason. After some effort, she was able to buy a cement mixer to help make her husband’s job easier.

Veronica started out by joining the Communal Bank “Las Amigas” (The Friends). She demonstrated that she was responsible by serving as the Secretary of Records and submitting her payments on time. Veronica lives at her parents’ house and plans to buy her own home in the future so that her young daughter will be more comfortable.

This loan will be used to increase her operating capital. Veronica will buy merchandise for the many orders she has already received. She is extremely grateful to Emprender for the support it has provided.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise to fulfill her orders

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a stand and merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Floria

texts.es: Floria, una mujer valiente y optimista, de 45 años, convive con Amilcar, de 46 años; ambos tuvieron 7 hijos; de los cuales 3 murieron, ahora ellos viven solo con Ketty, de 15 años; en su casa propia ubicada en la zona rural de Santa Clara. A pesar de los constantes momentos difíciles que le toco vivir; Floria, afirma que nunca se amilano y saco fuerzas para salir adelante. Hace 18 años que se dedica a la agricultura, donde siembra papa en sus diferentes variedades (yungay, pericholi y de color). Ella distribuye sus actividades, ya que de la misma manera, tienen 7 años dedicándose también a la elaboración de queso; que la leche de las 5 vacas le proporciona. Gracias al apoyo coordinado de su esposo e hija, todos los días elabora una porción considerable de queso, el cual los vende en el anexo de Huasahuasi, como también en el mercado central de su localidad. De la misma manera su esposo comercializa la papa, que juntos siembran y cosechan en todas las estaciones del año. Actualmente Floria, está juntando dinero para mejorar su casa. Es el primer crédito con MFP y está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal, más respetado de su ciudad, donde podrá lograr sus objetivos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará 11 sacos de abono y guano de correal (abono natural); como también una parte del dinero lo invertirá en la compra de cuajo para la elaboración del queso.
texts.en:
Floria is a courageous and optimistic woman. She is 45 years old and lives with Amilcar, age 46. Together they had seven children, three of whom have already died. Now the only child that still lives with them is Ketty, who is 15 years old. Floria has her own home in the rural district of Santa Clara. Despite the difficult moments she has had to endure in her life, Floria says she never got discouraged and always found the strength to press forward. She has been farming for eighteen years, growing potatoes of different varieties (Yungay, Pericholi, and other types in different colors). Floria pursues other activities in the same manner. She has been making cheese for seven years and has five cows that provide the milk. Thanks to the coordinated support of her husband and daughter, Floria is able to devote a considerable amount of her time to making cheese and selling it in the neighboring district of Huasahuasi and also at the central market in town. In the same manner, her husband sells the potatoes they have grown and harvested together throughout the year. Floria is currently saving money in order to make improvements to her house.

This is her first loan with MFP. Floria is very pleased to be part of her Communal Bank, which is well-respected in her city because its members are able to accomplish their goals. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy eleven sacks of compost and “guano” (bird manure used as a natural fertilizer). In addition, part of the money will be invested in the purchase of enzymes used in making cheese.

loans.use: Purchase compost & guano for her crops; acquire enzymes used in making cheese

loans.name: Ensels Enrrique

texts.es: El señor R. L. tiene una jardinería ubicada sobre la carretera en la entrada de Catarina, en donde ofrece diferentes tipos de variedades de plantas y con este negocio logra mantenerse y aportar a su familia ya que él es soltero, en estos momentos solicita un crédito con CEPRODEL para la compra de maseteras variadas y plátanos de jardín, ya que tiene varios encargos que le hicieron sus clientes.
texts.en: R. L. has a gardening store located on the road at the entrance of Catarina. He sells various types of plants. He is single and thanks to his business he is able to support himself and help his family. He is requesting a loan from CEPRODEL to purchase various planters and garden plants because he already has various orders from customers.

loans.use: Purchase various planters and garden plants

loans.name: Delcy Aacely

texts.es:
Delcy de 40 años, tiene un pequeño comedor en la parte delantera de su casa, vive en Primavera de Duran (zona periurbana, con una ecología en disolución a las afuera de Guayaquil). 

Para ser una fuente de ingresos y solventar los gastos familiares ella invirtió sus ahorros en víveres para hacer comidas y tener su propio negocio de almuerzos. Poco a poco con dedicación y ayuda de su hija mayor pudo tener su negocio de comidas en la parte delantera de su casa. Trabaja desde muy temprano cocinando la comida hasta que llega su hija y le ayuda a repartir los platos. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar mesas, sillas y víveres para su comedor. En el futuro quiere tener bien adecuado el local y termina de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Delcy, age 40, manages a small diner in the front part of her house. She lives in Primavera de Duran (a periurban area with a deteriorating ecosystem, located on the outskirts of Guayaquil).

In order to have a source of income to meet her family’s expenses, Delcy invested her savings in groceries for preparing dishes and started her own business serving lunches. With dedication and the help of her eldest daughter, she gradually established her food business at the front of her house. Delcy begins work very early, cooking food until her daughter arrives and helps with serving the dishes.

With this loan Delcy plans to buy tables, chairs, and groceries for her diner. In the future, she wants to have an adequate location and finish the construction of her house.

loans.use: Purchase tables, chairs, and groceries

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José Luis tiene 48 años, es casado y vive junto a su esposa y a un hijo de 6 años en la zona urbana del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad dedicada principalmente a la agricultura y que se caracteriza por poseer una geografía accidentada dada su cercanía a la sierra del país. Se encuentra ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de diez años a la venta de productos de primera necesidad y abarrotes en una bodega instalada en uno de los ambientes de su domicilio. Sus principales clientes son los vecinos y pobladores de la zona, los cuales prefieren su negocio debido al buen trato y a la calidad de los productos que brinda. Esta actividad se ha constituído como la principal fuente de ingresos para su familia por lo que siempre se esfuerza para sacarla adelante.

José Luis desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería de modo que su negocio pueda crecer y pueda satisfacer la demanda con la que actualmente cuenta, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar  por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

El es bastante trabajador y entregado a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresario para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is 48 years old, he is married and he lives together with his wife and their 6-year old son in an urban region of the district of Oyotun. It is primarily an agricultural community and the topography is characterized by its slopes, given the proximity of the country's mountain range. It is located an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

For more than ten years he has sold basic needs products and groceries from a section of his house that has been converted into a store. His main clients are his neighbors and the population of his region. They prefer to visit his store for the excellent customer service and for the quality products he sells. This business has become the principal source of income for his family, for which reason he has invested so much energy. 

Jose Luis wishes to expand his business with the purchase of more merchandise, so to see his business grow and meet the client demand. He requests a first time loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles. 

He is very hard working and very devoted to his family. His goal is to keep growing as a small business owner to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise to stock his store.

loans.name: Jeny Ruth

texts.es: La señora Yeny trabaja como intermediaria de mercadería con la aduana , desde hace dos años, no cuenta con mercadería especifica,  ya que la señora comercia cualquier mercadería que llegue a aduana y que no cuente póliza de importación la señora se ocupa de realizar los tramites de aduana y posteriormente lo comercia al por mayor y menor a personas particulares entrega esta mercadería a distintos puestos  . Solicito el crédito para poder cancelar tramites en fonvis (fondo de vivienda social) al comercio se dedica con la colaboración de su esposo, ya que le ayuda en el traslado de la mercadería, es una persona muy activa y trabajadora,  trabaja desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Yeny has worked in the shipping department of the country's border services.  She doesn't have any type of specific merchandise for resale because she sells whatever merchandise that comes to through her office that does not meet importation policies.  She sells these items on wholesale and retail to various individuals. She requests a loan to pay off her Fonvis debt (a social housing fund). She works together with her husband in this business. He provides transportation of the goods. She is a very active and hard working person. She works from the very early morning hours. She is very grateful for the support provided to her.

loans.use: To make social housing payment.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es: Sabina, una mujer alegre y trabajadora de 46 años; está casada con Alejandro, de 47 años, ambos tienen 5 hijos. Gracias al esfuerzo y trabajo de ellos lograron sacar adelante a 2 de sus primeros hijos, y ahora solo viven con los 3 últimos; todos ellos menores de edad. A las afueras de la ciudad de Tarma, en la parte alta del cerro, ahí donde se ubica el Centro Poblado de Santa Clara, encontramos los sembríos de Sabina. Hace 30 años que se dedica a la agricultura, desde que era adolescente, sus padres le otorgaron un parcela, que con el tiempo y, las buenas ganancias que dejó sus cultivos de papa, la ayudaron a adquirí más adelante muchos terrenos agrícolas, donde hoy siembra gran cantidad de papa. Pero no solo a eso se dedica Sabina, ella también cría vacas, las alimenta y cuida con mucho esmero ya que sabe, que de ello depende su producción de queso, el cual vende al por mayor en el mercado central de su ciudad. Por el trabajo de tantos años, ella quiere abrir un pequeño negocio de compra y venta de tubérculos, ya que su experiencia garantiza su éxito. Es el noveno crédito con MFP y está muy satisfecha de las facilidades que le da su banco comunal, para poder salir adelante. Con el crédito que obtendrá comprará abono orgánico, con ello quiere asegurar su producción de papa en sus diferentes variedades (yungay, pericholi y de color).
texts.en: Sabina is a very happy and hard working woman. She is 46 years old and she is married with Alejandro, 47 years old, and they have 5 children together. It is thanks to their combined hard work that they were able to support their 2 eldest children. And now they only live with their three school-aged children. In the outskirts of the city of Tarma, in the plateau region of the mountains is the Centro Poblado de Santa Clara. There is where we find Sabina and her plantations. For more than 30 years she has been an agriculturist. When she was and adolescent her parents gave her a parcel of land. With time and with the good earnings yielded from her potato plantation she was able to purchase much more land. Today she harvests potatoes in great quantities. But this is not Sabina's only business. She is also a cattle farmer. She feeds them and shepherd's them with great care, knowing that it directly relates to the cheese produced.  She sells cheese in wholesale in the central market of the city.  For having worked for so many years she wishes to open a small business, buying and selling tubers, especially because her vast experience guarantees its success. This is her ninth loan she requests through MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is very happy with the support provided to her through her community bank.  This loan will be used to purchase organic fertilizer to secure her potato harvest. She sows potatoes of different varieties: yungay, pericholi and colored potatoes.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer to secure her potato harvest.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To use as working capital.

loans.name: José Alejandro

texts.es: El señor S. P. labora en la Alcaldía Municipal de Catarina, con guarda de seguridad en donde ya tiene dos años de antigüedad y con este salario logra sostener su familia ya que solo él y su esposa conviven ya que sus hijos ya son mayores y casados además que ya se fueron a vivir por su parte, el visita las oficinas de CEPRODEL para solicitar un crédito y pagar unos gastos personales que posee.
texts.en: S. P. works in the Catarina Town Hall as a security guard. He has two years of experience in this job and with his salary he is able to support his family. He and his wife live alone as their children are grown up, married and went to live in other places. He visited the CEPRODEL offices to request a loan to pay for personal expenses.

loans.use: Personal expenses

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
Susana es una madre de familia de 50 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a uno de sus hijos en el sector Huaca Partida, una zona rural que pertenece al distrito de Pítipo y que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Ferreñafe, a más de cuarenta y cino minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace mas de diez años a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino, ella cría ovejas en un corral situado cerca a su domicilio y las alimenta de pastos naturales. Cuando ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan la zona en donde vive y al publico en general. Con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad ella se encarga de ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento económico de su familia.

Susana desea adquirir mas ovejas para ampliar su negocio de crianza y venta, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles con los que piensa lograr su objetivo.

Ella ya ha tenido créditos anteriormente con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus cuotas. Susana es una mujer tranquila y responsable. En la imagen aparece junto con un cerdo que cria adicionalmente, sus ovejas salen a pastar por la mañana.
texts.en:
Susana is a Mom, she is 50 years old and she lives together with her husband and one of their children in the Huaca Partida region. It is a rural region belonging to the district of Pitipo and it is located in the province of Ferrenafe. It is located more than forty five minutes from the city of Chiclayo. 

For more than ten years she has been a sheep farmer. She raises sheep in a corral near her home and she feeds them natural grasses. When the livestock has reached a certain level in their development she sells them to the merchants who visit the region and to the general population.  With the income that she earns from this business she is able to contribute with her husband to the financial support of their family. 

Susana wishes to purchase more sheep in order to expand her business. To this end she has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 2000 nuevos soles. 

She has had previous loans with Edpyme Alternativa and she has demonstrated her commitment and responsibility towards her payments. Susana is a calm and responsible woman. In the photo she appears together with one of the pigs she raises too. The sheep go to the pastures in the morning to feed.

loans.use: To purchase sheep.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es: La Sra. Cecilia es una clienta antigua que anteriormente formo parte de un Banco de Emprendimiento y luego de un grupo solidario así se hizo conocer con nuestra institución como un persona muy trabajadora y responsable, la Sra. vive por la zona de la mutualista y se dedica a la venta de comidas a la hora del Almuerzo en su domicilio además ya tiene clientes fijos hace 2 platos diferentes para cada día como la Sra. se esta haciendo conocer por la zona se ha comprado un auto para poder llevar el almuerzo a domicilio para dar un mejor servicio el dinero que solicito es justamente para poner ese auto en condiciones para ser usado ya que es un modelo antiguo. La Sra. Cecilia ya tiene un lote ubicado cerca de la Localidad de Cotoca donde planea construir su vivienda y vivir aparte de su familia que son sus padres y sus hermanas, ya que es un poco incomodo, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Cecilia is a long-time member that was at first a member of the community bank named Emprendimiento. But later she became known to this organization through another group. She is known to be a responsible and hard working person. She lives in the Mutualista region and she prepares lunches for sale from her home. She has some steady clients and she prepares 2 different dishes to serve every day. She is getting to be known in the region so she purchased a car to be able to deliver her lunch meals and provide better service. The loan that she requests is to carry out some maintenance repairs to the car. The car is an old model and it was purchased used.  Cecilia has a plot of land located in the community of Cotoca and she plans to build a house. She wants to have her own home, separate from her parents and her sisters because it is somewhat uncomfortable. She is very grateful with the organization for their support.

loans.use: To repair her car.

loans.name: Manuela De Jesús

texts.es: La señora L. posee una panadería en la que hace diferentes tipos de pan de esta actividad se mantiene ella y una hija ya que el esposo trabaja por aparte y sus otros hijos ya se le fueron de su casa, ella solicita un crédito con CEPRODEL ya que quiere aprovechar la temporada ya que le están ofreciendo vender un poco mas barato la harina.
texts.en: Mrs. L. has a bakery and makes various types of bread. Through her work she supports herself and one daughter as her husband works elsewhere and her other children have already left home. She is requesting a loan from CEPRODEL so that she can make the most of the season since flour prices are currently a little cheaper than usual.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients (flour)

loans.name: Rosa Alba

texts.es: Rosa Alba tiene 59 años, su actividad es la venta de ropa usada.  Se dedica desde hace cinco años a este tipo. Eventualmente en su vivienda es donde ofrece la variedad de productos durante todos estos años ha podido hacerse famosa en el rubro y actualmente cuenta con un grupo de clientes fieles. Ella desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más mercadería, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito con los que piensa adquirir más ropa variada y lograr su objetivo. Es una persona trabajadora y bastante responsable.  Pues se encuentra muy alegre con esta oportunidad, pues es su primer crédito  y tendrá puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus pagos.
texts.en: Rosa Alba is 59 years old and she sells used clothing. She has had this business for the past 5 years. She makes her sales from her home and she offers a variety of products. During all these years she has made a name for herself and she has earned herself a steady clientele.  She wishes to expand her business with the purchase of more merchandise. To this end she has requested a loan. With these funds she will acquire a variety of clothing and she will be able to reach her goal. She is a very hard working person and she is very responsible. She is very happy with the opportunity she is granted. This is her first loan and she is committed to the terms of this loan.

loans.use: To use as working capital.

loans.name: Bismark Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Bismark Antonio F. H.  él es Trabajador activo del colegio “Monte limar” desempeñándose como Maestro de Educación Primaria tiene  Veinte años de trabajar como docente es casado actualmente tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  siete créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando  para ampliarle a su casa con un cuarto mas, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Bismark Antonio F. H. is an active worker in the Monte Limar school. He is a first  grade teacher. He has been a teacher for the past 20 years, he is married and he has 2  school-aged children.
