She owns a house that she wants to improve.  The loan will be used to buy zinc metal sheeting and lumber to repair the home.  This will allow her to provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: To buy zinc metal sheeting and lumber.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: El Sr. Rigoberto G. G. él se dedica a la siembra de granos como maíz  tiene  treinta años  de dedicarse a esta actividad es casado actualmente. Ha tenido tres créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de insumo y preparación del terreno para la siembra los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Rigoberto G. G. has been farming grains such as corn for thirty years. He's currently married. He's had three loans with CEPRODEL and he's used each on for the purchase of supplies for preparing the land to be farmed. The CEPRODEL loans have benefited him greatly because he's been able to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase of farming materials such as fertilizer, cleaning supplies, ground preparation, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Construction of a room

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR D. LOS TEMBLORES II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco  y departamento D. Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Celia; ella tiene 50 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. golosinas y gaseosas, ella tiene un pequeño puesto en una D. las calles del cusco que atienD. desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m.la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas como galletas, dulces y gaseosas al por mayor.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank “SEÑOR D. LOS TEMBLORES II”. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Ms. Celia, she is 50 years old and is married with 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling sweets and soft drinks. She has a small stall in one of the streets in Cusco where she works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. She wants to expand her business. She is requesting a loan to buy sweets like cookies, candy and soft drinks in bulk.

She thanks those who are part of this dream by means of this loan and agrees to comply with the payment of her loan within the time established.

loans.use: Purchase sweets like cookies, candy and soft drinks in bulk.

loans.name: Rubén Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Rubén Valdés vive en el municipio Santa Rosa Del Peñón de León. Trabaja actualmente en una institución en el municipio esforzandose para llevar el sustento a su casa de habitación y así beneficiar a su familia.

Actualmente está solicitando un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como ladrillo y cemento para mejorar su vivienda ya que requiere llevar a cabo dicha obra a lo inmediato para así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia que tanto lo necesita hoy en día.
texts.en:
This client's name is Rubén Antonio Valdés L.. He lives in the municipality of Santa Rosa del Peñón, in the department of León, 1 block east of the health clinic. He has a live-in partner and currently works for the Santa Rosa eel Peñón MINSA [Ministry of Health] as a disease vector control technician. He has worked for this institution for 15 years. 

The client has his own house, which he would like to improve. The loan will be used to buy bricks and cement for his house, since he plans to construct a new room. This will allow him to achieve a better life with his family.

loans.use: Buying bricks and cement to improve his home

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: La Sra. Rosario y el Sr. Jaime son un matrominio muy unido, ellos tienen un negocio con el cual se sustentan, viven humildemente en una casita que les ha costado mucho trabajo tener, ahora ellos necesitan reparar el techo del baño y poner el vitropiso por que cuando llueve se les transmina el baño.
texts.en:
Rosario and her husband Jaime are a close married couple.  They have a store that supports them.  They live humbly in a small house that they worked very hard for.

They currently need to repair the roof of the bathroom and put in tiles because when it rains, it leaks into the bathroom.

loans.use: Roof repair and tile installation

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda es socia del Bancomunal Solidaridad, se dedica a la compra D.  vacunos, ovinos, porcinos y caprinos esto lo adquiere en las ferias D.: Putacca, Vinchos, Vilcanchos, Totos, etc .todo esto lo adquiere para la venta D. carne lo cual lo reparte D. casa en casa y lo venD. al crédito cobrándolo D. manera mensual.
La dificultad que tiene es que a veces no le pagan puntualmente, el préstamo que solicita lo va emplear en la compra D. ovinos y vacunos.
El sueño D. Hilda es poder hacer crecer su capital para asi poder comprar mas animales.
texts.en:
Hilda is a member of the "Bancomunal Solidaridad" [Solidarity Communal Bank]. Her work is buying cattle, sheep, pigs and goats, which she acquires at the markets in Putacca, Vinchos, Vilcanchos, Totos, etc., and selling the meat, which she delivers from house to house and sells on credit, collecting payments each month. 

One difficulty she has is that sometimes her customers do not pay punctually. The loan she is requesting will be used to by sheep and cattle. 

Hilda's dream is to be able to increase her capital so that she can buy more animals.

loans.use: Buying sheep and cattle

loans.name: Genaro Agustín

texts.es: El Sr. Genaro Agustín E. G. él es Trabajador activo del Ministerio publico desempeñándose como notificador tiene  tres años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales para su negocio de fotografía los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Genaro Agustín E. G. is an active worker in the Attorney General's office.  For three years he has worked as a process server.  He is married and has a school aged son.  

He has had two loans from CEPRODEL and each one has helped purchase materials for his photography business.  The loans from CEPRODEL have benefited him and his business very much and have helped improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: Purchase materials for his photography business

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE LOS TEMBLORES II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Avelina; ella tiene 47 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de fabricación y venta de helados, ella trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta 8:00 p.m y después lo vende en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de helados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para hacer los helados.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the community bank “SEÑOR DE LOS TEMBLORES II”. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Ms. Avelina, she is 47 years old and a widow with 3 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of making and selling ice cream. She works from 5:00 am to 8:00 pm and then sells her product directly on the streets of the city of Cusco. She wants to expand her business of selling ice cream. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients to make ice cream.

She thanks those who are a part of this dream by means of this loan and agrees to comply with the payment of her loan within the established time.

loans.use: Buy ingredients to make ice cream.

loans.name: Omar Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Omar Antonio M. L.  el es Trabajador activo de la Alcaldía Municipal de San Rafael del Sur  desempeñándose como Guarda de Seguridad  tiene  cinco  años de trabajar en esta institución, es casado actualmente tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Omar Antonio M. L. is an active worker of the San Rafael del Sur municipal government.  He has worked as a security guard for five years.  He is married and has a school aged child.  

He has had four loans with CEPRODEL and each one has been for the purchase of construction materials to improve his house.  The loans from CEPRODEL have benefited him very much because he has been able to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials (sand, cement, quarry stone)

loans.name: Mayra Del Socorro

texts.es:
El clienta Mayra Del Socorro P. Martínez. Vive en el municipio santa Rosa Del Peñón departamento de león Del Centro De Salud 75 Varas Al Oeste, Es Soltera  trabaja actual mente en MINSA santa Rosa del peñón desempeñan el cargo como Enfermera Asistente tiene 16 años de estar laborando en esta institución.
El cliente cuanta con una casa de habitación propia el cual la quiere mejorar.
El destino del crédito es para la Compra de ladrillo y sementó para su vivienda el cual tiene propuesto construir una nueva pieza.  
Esto le permitirá que la clienta pueda obtener una mejor vida con su familia.
texts.en:
The client Mayra del Socorro P. M.lives in the town of Santa Rosa del Peñon in the León area about 75 yards from the Centro de Salud (Health Center).  She is single and currently works in MINSA (a wheat flour factory) as an assistant nurse and has worked in this institution for sixteen years.  
The client has her own home which she would like to improve.  The loan will be used to buy bricks and cement for her home so that she can add onto it.  This will allow her to have a better life with her her family.

loans.use: To buy bricks and cement for her home.

loans.name: Rina

texts.es:
Rina es socia del Bancomunal Solución, tiene 36 años, es conviviente, tiene 3 hijos, el mayor tiene 14 años y el último tiene  1 año y medio. Rina se dedica ala venta de abarrotes en general ( azúcar, arroz, aceite, quaker, leche, fideos, detergentes, aceite, jabón, lejía, Etc) este negocio lo realiza en su casa desde hace 10 años. Lo que mas le gusta de FINCA Perú son los valores que practica en su Bancomunal; menciona que no tuvo ninguna dificultad al realizar su negocio y el préstamo que solicita lo va ha invertir en la compra de: detergentes, aceite, jabón, lejía, Etc. 
El sueño de Rina es poder tener una casa comercial y poder sacar a sus hijos profesionales.
texts.en:
Rina is a member of the Solution community bank.  She is 36 years old, married, and has three children.  The oldest is 14 years old and the youngest is a year and a half.  

Rina works selling groceries and necessities (sugar, rice, oil, oats, milk, pasta, detergents, soap, bleach, etc).  This business has been located in her house for ten years.  

She likes FINCA Perú because of the values that are practiced in her community bank.  She has no difficulty conducting her business, and she will invest this loan in the purchase of detergents, oil, soap, bleach, and other items.

Rina's dream is to have store for her business and for her children to become professionals.

loans.use: Purchase of detergent, oil, soap, bleach, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Concepción

texts.es: La Sra. Rosa Concepción G. R.  ella se dedica al negocio de Venta de Verdura y granos básico tiene cuatro años de dedicarse a esta actividad, es casada actualmente, tiene tres hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  siete créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de verduras y granos  para su negocio y así  ampliarlo,  los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Concepción G. R. sells vegetables and basic grains.  She has been doing this for four years.  She is married, and she has three school age children.

She has had seven loans with CEPRODEL.  She has used each one of them to buy vegetables and grains in order to expand her business.  The loans from CEPRODEL have greatly benefited her.  This is the way she has improved her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: To buy basic grains and vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE LOS TEMBLORES II”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Carmela; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella atiende desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 9:30 p.m y por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar la tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como azúcar,arroz,leche y aceite al por mayor.


La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Carmela belongs to the Señor de los Temblores II Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Carmela is 38 years old.  She lives with her life partner, and she has three children. 

She alternates her daily activities with work in her grocery store.  She works there from 7:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m.  It is through this business that she gets her children ahead.

She wants to expand her grocery store.  Carmela is asking for a loan to buy products wholesale like sugar, rice, milk, and oil.

She is grateful to all those who share in her dream through this forum, and she pledges to repay in a timely fashion.

loans.use: To buy products wholesale like sugar, rice, milk, and oil

loans.name: Norma Lucia

texts.es: La Sra. C. es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchista tiene un negocio de abarrotes ubicado enseguida de su casa el local se lo presto su cuñada por que estaba desahabitado, en este momento su cuñada va irse a vivr a dicho lugar es poreso la señora C. tiene la necesidad de ampliar su casa en la parte de enfrente para colocar su negocio, el esposo trabaja de albañil independiente y tienen muy buena ralacion familiar ese hogar es de su suegro el cual es una persona mayor pensionada y vive con ellos ya que la Sra. tambien se hace cargo de su suegro tiene dos hijos, los cual nunca ha desatendido es por eso en lugar de salir a trabajar prefirio colocar el negocio en su casa, el credito lo requiere para dicha ampliacion que tiene que realizar.
texts.en:
Mrs. C. is a very hard-working and tenacious woman.  She has a grocery business, which is located next to her house.  Her mother-in-law lent her the place because no one was living there.  Her mother-in-law is now going to live there.

That is why Mrs. C. has to expand the front part of her house for her business.  Her husband works as an independent brick layer. They have a good relationship with their family.  Their house is their father-in-law’s, and he lives with them. He is an elderly pensioner, and Mrs.C. takes care of him.

Mrs. C. has two children, and she has always taken care of them.  That is why she prefers to set up the business in her house instead of leaving to go to work.  She needs the loan for the aforementioned expansion that she has to do.

loans.use: To finish building the stand in her house

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Eudoxia

texts.es:
Eudoxia es socia del Bancomunal Solición, tiene 56 años, es madre soltera de una hija de 20 años, la cual se esta preparando para poder ingresar en la universidad, Eudoxia se dedica a la venta de abarrotes (detergente, aceite, fideos, harina, jabón de ropa y de cara, leche, huevo, galletas caramelos, etc) este negocio lo realiza en un local que es alquilado en el barrio de Belén, su negocio lo tiene desde hace 20 años, también se dedica la venta de granos(haba, maíz, trigo, cebada, fréjol, etc.) el que reparte a las vendedoras de cereales y lo deja al crédito para 5 a 10 días.
El préstamo que solicita lo va ha emplear en la compra de granos (maíz, cebada y trigo).
Su sueño es poder trasladar su tienda a su casa propia que queda en el barrio de Santa para ello lo esta haciendo construir.
texts.en:
Eudoxia is a member of the Solution community bank.  She is 56 years old and the single mother of a 20 year old daughter, who is preparing to enroll in university.  

Eudoxia works selling groceries (detergent, oil, pasta, flour, soap, milk, eggs, biscuits, sweets, etc).  Her business is located in a rented store in the Belén neighborhood.  She has had this business for twenty years.  She also works selling grains (beans, corn, wheat, barley, pigeon peas, etc).  She acts as a dealer to grain sellers and gives them credit for 5 to 10 days.

She is asking for this loan to purchase grains like corn, barley, and wheat.

Her dream is to move her store to her own home in the Santa neighborhood that she is building.

loans.use: Purchase grains like corn, barley, and wheat

loans.name: Miguel Santiago

texts.es: El Sr. Miguel Santiago C. G.  el es Trabajador activo de la Alcaldía Municipal de San Rafael del Sur  desempeñándose como responsable de trasporte tiene dos años de trabajar en esta institución, es casado actualmente tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de Repuesto y mantenimiento de su moto taxi ya que el brinda el servicio de moto taxi en la localidad, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Miguel Santiago C. G. is a worker in the town of San Rafael del Sur working in transportation.  He has been working in this area for two years, he is married, and he has a child in school.  He has had four loans from CEPRODEL and has been used to replace or maintain parts of his moto taxi so that he can offer moto taxi service in his town.  The loans from CEPRODEL have greatly benefited him as he has been able to improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: Repairs and Maintenance of Moto-Taxi

loans.name: Jose Augusto

texts.es:
José de 40 años, tiene un taller eléctrico. Vive con su esposa y dos hijas en Primavera de Duran (zona periurbana, con una ecología en disolución a las afuera de Guayaquil).

Empezó hace 18 años atrás con un taller de electricidad, le llamo la atención esta profesión porque desde pequeño el estudio electricidad y siempre quiso ser independiente con un taller. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 09h00am hasta las 20h00pm todos los días. Repara todo tipo de aparatos electrónicos como televisores, equipos de sonido, etc. 

Parra seguir con la misma fluidez que tiene en su taller eléctrico el quiere comprar con el préstamo herramientas y repuestos para los aparatos eléctricos. En el futuro quiere termina de construir su casa y así darle una buena vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is 40 years old and has an electrical workshop.  He lives with his wife and two daughters in Primavera de Duran (a peri-urban zone with an endangered environment outside of Guayaquil).

He started working 18 years ago in an electrical workshop.  He was interested in this profession because he has studied electrical work since he was young, and he always wanted to be independent and have a workshop.  He currently works from 9:00am until 8:00pm every day.  He repairs all types of electronics like televisions, sound systems, etc.

To continue having the same flexibility that he has in his electrical workshop, he is asking for this loan to buy tools and parts for electronics.  

In the future, he would like to finish building his house and give his children a good life.

loans.use: Purchase tools and parts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Compra de materiales de construcción: Arena, Cemento, Piedra cantera, etc.

loans.name: Aquilina

texts.es:
Aquilina es socia del Bancomunal Solución, es madre soltera, tiene 1 hijo que es adoptado y tiene 40 años. Aquilina se dedica a la siembra y venta de alfalfa, tomate, lechuga, zanahoria ,etc este negocio lo heredó de sus padres ya que menciona que desde que tiene uso de razón lo ha venido realizando, los productos que siembra (compañía) lo vende en el mercado Nery García al por mayor, esta venta lo realiza por temporadas según salga la siembra. Menciona que la dificultad es cuando cae granizo y cuando el río se desborda ya que su terrero esta al borde del río.
Lo que más le gusta de Finca Perú es que puede ahorrar y poder salir adelante, el sueño de Aquilina es poder abrir su tienda y arrendar su terreno.
texts.en:
Aquilina is a member of Bancomunal Solución (Communal Bank Solutions).  She is a single mother with one adopted child and she is 40-years-old.  Aquilina works growing and selling alfalfa, tomatoes, lettuce, carrots, etc.  She inherited this business from her parents and she mentioned that for as long as she can remember she has been working to produce and sell these products in the Nery Garcia Market for whole-sale buyers.  These sales are done seasonally, following the growing season.  She says that it is most difficult when there is hail and when the river floods as her land is along the banks of the river. 
What she likes best about Finca Perú is that she can save and get ahead.  Aquilina’s dream is to be able to open her own store and lease her land.

loans.use: To buy seeds to grow.

loans.name: Vista Hermosa Group

texts.es:
La señora Marbella V. V., vive en ocotepec Estado de Chiapas México. Vive en unión libre  con el señor Humberto Morales C., los dos están ansiosos esperando a su primer bebe que nacerá en unos meses y están muy felices.

      Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de pollos y guajolotes de rancho, lleva practicando esta actividad desde hace ocho meses, durante éste tiempo le ha ido muy bien, y gracias al préstamo que solicita podrá invertirlo en la compra de alimentos para que crezcan bien y los pueda vender a un buen precio y pueda tener mejores ingresos en su hogar.
 
    Lo que lo inspiro fue su familia ya que con ello podrá sostenerse y obtener ingresos en su  hogar apoyando a su esposo y juntos salgan adelante con su pequeño que esta por nacer y quiere darle lo mejor.
Con las ganancias que obtiene de la venta compra  más animales  para seguir criándolos, como también comprarle alimento para que se críen en buena calidad y su clientela se sienta satisfecha con su compra que realiza.

   Su sueño es que con su actividad logre  ahorrar para  comprar un solar en donde pueda construir su casa ya que donde vive es de su mama y quiere algo mejor para su familia que es lo más importante para ella.

Se integro al programa por las promociones que se realizaron en su localidad, la cual ella se intereso, le platico a su mama la señora marcela, buscaron otra persona más y formaron el grupo. El grupo se llama vista hermosa la razón del nombre es porque en donde viven es un lugar de muchos árboles y dan una vista muy bonita.
   El grupo se integra de tres personas dos mujeres y un hombre quienes viven en el mismo lugar y son las siguientes:

  Marbella V. V.: invierte el préstamo en la compra de pollos de rancho y guajolotes y luego venderlo en la misma región.
  Marcela V. C.: invierte el préstamo en la compra de alimentos y maíz para mantener sus pollos y guajolotes.
  Edith Pérez C.: el es la primera vez que solicita el préstamo y también lo invertirá en la compra de pollos y guajolotes de rancho.
texts.en:
Marbella V. V. lives in Ocotepec, Chiapas in Mexico.  She lives with her partner, Humberto Morales C., and both are anxiously awaiting the arrival of their first baby who will be born in a few months.  They are very happy.  

She works buying and selling chickens and turkeys from the ranch.  She has been doing this for eight months and during this time it has gone very well for her.  Thanks to the loan she is requesting, she will be able to invest in feed so that they grow well and so that she can sell them for a good price and have more income for her home.

What inspired her was her family so that with this she can sustain them and have income for her home to support her husband so that together they can get ahead with their baby that is about to be born and give him the best opportunities.  With the profits that she receives from the sales she will buy more animals to continue raising them and will also buy them feed so that they grow into a good quality product so that her customers feel satisfied with their purchase.  

Her dream is to be able to use this business to save in order to buy a lot where she can build her house as right now where she lives belongs to her mother and she wants something better for her family because her family is the most important thing to her.

She joined the program because of the advertising they did en her area, this interested her and she talked to her mother, Marcela, and they looked for another person to form the group.  Their group is called Vista Hermosa (Beautiful View).  The reason behind the name is because they live in a place with many trees and beautiful views.

The group is made up of three people: two women and a man who all live in the same place and are the following:

Marbella V. V.: will invest the loan in the purchase of chickens and turkeys and then sell them in the same area.

Marcela V. C.: will invest the loan in the purchase of feed and corn to take care of her chickens and turkeys.

Edith Pérez C.: this is the first time that he is requesting a loan and he will also invest it in the purchase of chickens and turkeys from the ranch.

loans.use: To buy chickens and turkeys from the ranch to sell them in the area.

loans.name: Ruth Oneida

texts.es: La sra. Ruth y su esposo son personas que trabajan en una maquiladora por lo cual desean poner las telas mosqueteras a su casa y construir la barda para proteger su patrimonio ya que salen muy temprano a trabajar y regresan al atardeser y su casa permanece sola gran parte de el dia y vieron en este prestamo la manera de realisar su proyecto mas rapido.
texts.en: Ruth and her husband work in a maquiladora. They wish to put mosquito nets in their home and build a fence to protect their assets since they leave very early to go to work and return in the evening and their home remains empty for a large part of the day. They saw in this loan a way to accomplish their project more quickly.

loans.use: Build a fence and buy mosquito nets.

loans.name: Arenal Group

texts.es:
Arenal es un grupo conformado por trece integrantes que como cualquier persona común, trabajan para tener un buen nivel de vida y sobre todo para que sus hijos crezcan en un ambiente en el cual siempre tengan lo indispensable para su desarrollo. El nombre del grupo surgió ya que su calle se llama así, ellos se ubican a las orillas de Huitzizingo, Estado de México. 

María Guadalupe Z. de 36 años de edad, con una familia integrada por su esposo y sus dos hijos quienes se encuentran estudiando la primaria y de los cuales se siente muy orgullosa. Mari se dedica a la venta de sabanas, colchas, edredones desde hace cuatro años y con la venta de pan lleva cinco meses, comienza desde muy temprano con la venta de pan y posteriormente sale a ofrecer sus sabanas con sus vecinos y a las comunidades de su alrededor ya que para ella es  muy importante cada oportunidad de venta que se le presente, su pan lo surte diario y sus sabanas y colchas cada quince días y ahora en el mes de diciembre espera que sus ventas se incremente mas. La atención que brinda hacia las personas es buena ya que tiene mucha facilidad de palabra y eso es una ventaja para ella. El crédito que recibió ya lo tiene designado para la compra de sabanas, colchas, edredones y pan. Sus planes son poder iniciar un nuevo negocio como venta de cosméticos ya que ha visto que si se vende bien y sobre todo con las mujeres y así podrá tener un ingreso más para su familia.

Con el apoyo recibido de Kiva a través de Fundación Realidad los demás integrantes del grupo podrán hacer realidad muchos de sus planes y beneficiar así sus comunidades.

Juana G. H. (Venta de Abarrotes)
María Luisa N. G. (Carnicería)
María del Carmen A. D. (Venta de zapatos por catalogo)
Yemina R. G. (Venta de Jugos)
Amalia H. C. (Venta de Frutas y Legumbres)
Verónica S. C. (Venta de Servilletas Bordadas)
Alicia B. M. (Manualidades)
Daria H. C. (Venta de Cosméticos por catalogo)
Yolanda B. A. (Venta de Artículos Domésticos)
Rosa María N. G. (Venta de Postres)
María de los Ángeles B. M. (Taller Mecánico)
Guadalupe S. G. (Tienda de Ropa)
texts.en:
Arenal is a group with thirteen members who work together to have a good quality of life and so their children can grow up in an environment where they have everything for their development.  Their group is named Arenal because that is the street they live on.  They are located in the outskirts of Huitzizingo, Mexico.

María Guadalupe Z. is 36 years old.  She has a husband and two children who study at primary school.  She is very proud of them.  Mari has worked selling sheets, quilts, comforters for four years, and has been selling bread for five months.  She starts early selling bread, and then later sells her sheets to her neighbors and the communities around her.  Every opportunity to sell her products is important.  She stocks up on bread every day, and on sheets and quilts every fifteen days, and in the month of December, she expects her sales will increase.  She pays attention to her customers and has a way with words, which is an advantage for her.  

She plans to use this loan to purchase sheets, quilts, comforters, and bread.  In the future, she plans to start a new business selling cosmetics since she has seen that they sell very well, especially to women, and it will be more income for her family.

With the support of Kiva through the Fundación Realidad, the members of the group will be able to make their plans a reality and benefit their communities.

Juana G. H. (Groceries)
María Luisa N. G. (Butcher shop)
María del Carmen A. D. (Shoe sales from catalogs)
Yemina R. G. (Juice sales)
Amalia H. C. (Fruit and vegetable sales)
Verónica S. C. (Sale of embroidered napkins)
Alicia B. M. (Crafts)
Daria H. C. (Cosmetics sales by catalog)
Yolanda B. A. (Sale of household goods)
Rosa María N. G. (Bakery)
María de los Ángeles B. M. (Mechanic shop)
Guadalupe S. G. (Clothing store)

loans.use: Purchase of bread, quilts, comforters, blankets, groceries, orange, straws, meats, and more.

loans.name: Santos Evaristo

texts.es: El Sr. Santos Evaristo A. N. él se dedica  a la siembra de granos como frijoles, maíz etc,  tiene  quince años de dedicarse a esta actividad. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de insumos y granos para prepararse para la siembra los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Santos Evaristo A. N. is dedicated to the cultivation of grains such as beans, corn etc. He has been devoted to this activity for fifteen years. He has had two loans with field partner CEPRODEL and with each he has purchased supplies and grain to prepare for planting. He has benefited greatly from the loans with CEPRODEL as he has been able to improve living conditions for himself and his family.

loans.use: Purchase supplies and grain and pay rent for his land.

loans.name: Jazmín Amparo

texts.es: La Sra. Jazmín Amparo C. H.  ella es Trabajadora activa de la Alcaldía Municipal de San Rafael del Sur  desempeñándose como Secretaria tiene un año de trabajar en esta institución, tiene dos hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Ms. Jazmín Amparo C. H. is an active worker in the municipality of San Rafael del Sur where she has been working as a secretary for a year. She has two school-aged children. Jazmin has had two loans with field partner CEPRODEL and she has used each one to buy building materials to improve her home. The loans from CEPRODEL have benefited her greatly because she has improved living conditions for her and her family.

loans.use: Buy sand, cement and stone quarry.

loans.name: Blanca Nubia Hurtado Cruz

texts.es: La Sra. Blanca Nubia H. C. ella  es Trabajadora activa del colegio Público CERMA desempeñándose como Maestra de educación Primaria  tiene  veinte años de trabajar como docente es casada actualmente tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  ocho  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando  para ampliarle a su casa con un muro alrededor de su casa, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Ms. Blanca Nubia H. C. actively works at the public school CERMA as a primary school teacher. She has been working as a teacher for twenty years and is married with two school-age children. She has had eight loans with field partner CEPRODEL and she has used each one to purchase building materials to improve her house. She is requesting this loan to expand her home with a wall around her house. The loans with CEPRODEL have benefited her greatly because she has been able to improve living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, stone quarry, iron, gravel etc.

loans.name: Nubia Del Carmen

texts.es: La Sra. Nubia del Carmen C. C.  ella se dedica al negocio de pulpería tiene seis años de dedicarse a esta actividad, tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de mercadería para su pulpería y así  ampliarla,  los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Nubia del Carmen C. C. has worked at a grocery store for six years.  She has two school-aged children.

She has had four loans with CEPRODEL, and each of them have been for the purchase of merchandise to expand her grocery store.  Her loans from CEPRODEL have benefited her very much, and she has been able to improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: Purchase of basic grains, candy, and cosmetics

loans.name: Petrona Auxiliadora

texts.es: La Sra. Petrona Auxiliadora
texts.en: Ms. Petrona Auxiliadora

loans.use: To purchase construction materials: sand, cement, stone quarry etc.

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es: El Sr. Roberto Antonio M. él es Trabajador activo de la Alcaldía Municipal San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como conductor tiene  seis años de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  tres créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Roberto Antonio M. has been actively working as a driver for the San Rafael del Sur City Hall for six years.  He has had three loans through CEPRODEL and he has used the money from each one to buy building supplies to make improvements to his house.  This has benefited him very much because it’s allowed him to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: Building materials

loans.name: Francisco René

texts.es: El Sr.  Francisco René G. H. él es trabajador activo de la empresa CEMEX de Nicaragua desempeñándose como Mecánico industrial tiene veinte años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  tres  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para gastos personales y médicos,  los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Francisco René G. H. is married, works as an industrial mechanic for the CEMEX company in Nicaragua, and has been doing so for 20 years.  He has had three previous loans through CEPRODEL and has used each one to buy construction materials with which to make improvements to his home.  He is requesting this loan for personal medical expenses.  The CEPRODEL loans have benefited him greatly because they have allowed him to improve his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: Medical expenses

loans.name: Wuilton José

texts.es: El Sr. Wuilton José C. F. es Trabajador activo del centro de salud “Julio Buitrago Masa chapa” desempeñándose como responsable de estadística tiene  dieciocho años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente tiene dos hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  nueve créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Wuilton José C. F. is at active worker who is responsible for statistics at the Julio Buitrago Masa Chapa Health Center. He has worked for this organization for 18 years. He is married with two school-aged children. He has had nine loans with CEPRODEL (Kiva Field Partner) and each one has been used to buy construction materials to improve his house. These loans with CEPRODEL have benefited him greatly as they have allowed him to improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: To buy construction materials: sand, cement, stone, etc.

loans.name: Nubia Maria

texts.es:
Nubia de 38 años, vive con sus dos hijas que estudian en la escuela donde ella tiene su negocio ubicado en Primavera de Duran (zona periurbana, con una ecología en disolución a las afuera de Guayaquil). 

Hace cinco años ella comenzó con el bar en un Colegio llamado “Eloy Alfaro” ya que le dieR. la oportunidad de administrar el local en las tres jornadas y sacar sus propias ganancias. Cuando los niños salen al recreo comienzan sus ventas de golosinas, snack y otras comidas rápidas. En ocasiones su tía le ayuda atender el negocio ya que tiene tres jornadas que atender. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar dulces, snack, bebidas para su negocio. En el futuro quiere que sus hijos terminen sus estudios con éxito y poder ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Nubia is 38 years old and lives with her two daughters who attend the school where she has her business in Primavera de Duran (a peri-urban area with a deteriorating ecosystem on the outskirts of Guayaquil).

Five years ago she started working at the snack bar in a school called “Eloy Alfaro” because they gave her the opportunity to run the business for three days a week and make her own profits.  When the children go out for recess she sells candy, snacks and other fast food.  Her aunt sometimes helps her with the business because she must work there for three days.

With her loan she would like to buy sweets, candy, snacks and drinks for her business.  In the future she would like her children to successfully complete their studies and to be able to expand her business.

loans.use: Candy, snacks, drinks

loans.name: Indiana Araseles

texts.es:
Indiana de 39 años es casada con el Sr. Jose Santiago Miranda, con quien tiene 3 hijos, la mayor que ya esta casada y los dos menores estudiando la universidad; Indiana trabaja como Auxiliar de Enfermeria en el MINSA C/S desde hace 16 años. 

Esta solicitando  su 4to credito con el objetivo de levantar la tapia de su casa para brindarle mayor seguridad a su propiedad y a su familia.  

Su mayor sueño es que sus hijos logren coronar su carrera y sean personas de bien que puedan sacar adelante a nuestro pais.
texts.en:
Indiana, 39, is married to Mr. José Santiago Miranda with whom she has three children.  The oldest is already married and the two youngest are in the university.  Indiana has worked as a Nurse’s Aide at the Ministry of Health for the last 16 years.

She is asking for her 4th loan to build a wall to provide her property and her family with more security.

Her greatest dream is that her children complete their professional studies and become upstanding citizens able to help the country get ahead.

loans.use: To build a wall.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: La familia D. L. es una familia muy trabajadora ya que tiene su taller D. costura establesido desD. hace 10 años y con el cual sacaron a sus hijos adelante y utilisara su credito para la compra D. maquinaria y amplearan su taller para mejorar su ingreso familiar.
texts.en: The D. L. family is very hard-working and has had a sewing workshop for the past 10 years. The business has allowed the family and their children to stay afloat. They will use the loan to buy machinery and expand the workshop so they can increase their family income.

loans.use: to buy sewing machinery

loans.name: Isais

texts.es: El señor Isaías L. es padre de familia de 2 pequeños de edades entre 1 y 5 años, la casa que el tiene es de interés social y esta ubicada en una calle muy transitada, el quiere poner en la parte de enfrente una barda para brindar a su hijos mayor protección cuando salgan al patio a jugar. Isaías y su esposa trabajan en maquiladora para que entre los dos puedan a ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mr. Isaiah L. is a parent of 2 small children between ages of 1 and 5. The house he has is a low interest home and is located in a busy street. He wants to put in a front wall to provide their children greater protection when they go outside to play. Isaiah and his wife work in an assembly plant, and between the two of them, they can offer their family a better quality of life.

loans.use: Fence the front of his house

loans.name: Teofilo

texts.es: Teofilo A. es un señor muy trabajador desde hace 10 años presta sus servicios a un restaurante de un hotel muy conocido de la ciudad. Con estos ingresos es como  cubre los gastos familiares de el y su esposa. El señor Teofilo ya ha tenido prestamos en esta institución en el cual agradece ya que de esta manera el ha podido realizar sus proyectos. El quiere que se le apoye para poder comprar material de construcción y pago de mano de obra para enjarrar su casa y poner piso cerámico en la sala de su casa.
texts.en: Teofilo is a very hard-working man who has worked for 10 years at a restaurant in well-known hotel in his city. With this income, he covers family expenses for himself and his wife. Teofilo has already had loans with this institution, for which he is grateful, since it has enabled him to realize his goals. He hopes that you will support him so that he can buy construction materials and labor in order to plaster his home and lay down ceramic tile on his living room floor.

loans.use: Plaster a home

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: El cliente utilisara su credito para la compra de mobiliario y equipo para poder mejorar  la imajen de su negocio y asi poder jenerar un mayor ingreso y asi poder sacar adelante a su nieto ya que depende de ella y de su esposo y desean darle una buena educacion por que la mama de  el niño se encuentra enferma  y ellos se hicieron cargo total mente de el niño .los hijos de la señora josefina ya estan todos casados y apoyan a sus padres de la manera que le ayudan a acomodar sus platillos en sus respectivos trabajos.
texts.en:
This client will use her loan to buy some furniture and equipment to improve her business’ image and be able to generate more income.  This will help her to get her grandson ahead, since he depends on her and her husband and they want to provide a good education for him.  The child’s mother is sick and they have taken complete charge of the boy.

Josefina’s children are all married and also help support them as best they can.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Jahayra Elieth

texts.es:
ahayra Elieth de 32 años es soltera, no tiene hijos, es trabajadora de la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 3½ años y actualmente se desempeña como Bibliotecaria. 

Esta solicitando su 6to credito con el objetivo de ponerle el techo a una casita que tiene en la comarca El Quebrantadero, la cual es habitada por personas que estan encargadas de cuidar la propiedad los dias de semana que ella trabaja; adicionalmente se dedica a la venta de productos cosmeticos de AVON y ZERMAT a compañeras de trabajo y otra clientela que tiene, por lo que desea utilizar parte del credito para compra de los productos y surtir su pequeño negocio, pues obtiene ingresos adicionales que le permiten pagar sus gastos. 

El mayor sueño de Jahayra es formar su familia y poder brindarle las condiciones basicas de un hogar.
texts.en:
Jahayra Elieth, 32, is single and has no children.  She has worked for the City of Juigalpa for 3 and a half years, currently as a Librarian.

She is asking for her 6th loan to install a roof on her little house that she has in the El Quebrantadero settlement which is inhabited by people who care for the property during weekdays when she works. In addition, she also sells AVON and ZERMAT brand cosmetics to coworkers and other customers she has so she wants to use the loan to buy the products to stock her small business because it provides extra income for her to meet her expenses.

Jahayra’s greatest wish is to form her family and provide the basic living conditions of a home.

loans.use: To install a roof on her house and to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Place a slab for a room

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: La Sra. Rosa Argentina M. S. ella es Trabajadora activa del Colegio  público CERMA desempeñándose como Directora del Colegio tiene  dieciocho años de trabajar para el ministerio de educación. Ha tenido  cinco créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Argentina M. S. works at CERMA, a public school.  She works as the director of the school.  She has worked for the education ministry for 18 years.

She has had five loans with CEPRODEL.  She has used each one to buy construction materials and improve her house.  The CEPRODEL loans have been extremely beneficial to her.  That is the way she improved her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: To buy construction materials: zinc and crossbeams

loans.name: Don Bosco Group

texts.es:
Zenón participa más de tres años en la alcancía comunal DON BOSCO, los ocho integrantes son personas responsables y muy esforzadas en sus negocios; darles lo mejor a los suyos es su objetivo principal además de otros.
Zenón es un pensionista que trabajó muchos años en la mina, con el dinero que recibió de su liquidación compró un terreno que construyó años más tarde además adquirió un carro con el propósito de alquilarlo, al principio le iba bien en este negocio pero después tuvo que venderlo debido al choque que sufrió su vehículo, la reparación era muy costoso; así que esta vez compró una motocar el cual no ha tenido problemas hasta el momento, mensualmente de da mantenimiento. Los ingresos del alquiler de este bien cubren los gastos de alimentación para su familia y parte de educación a su nieto quien actualmente es ingeniero mecánico. El préstamo será para invertirlo en un pequeño taller electrónico que acondicionará en su casa, donde lo ayudará su hijo. Aquí se arreglarán celulares, radios, computadoras entre otros.  Se necesitará para invertir en comprar accesorios y repuestos para estos equipos.
texts.en:
Zenón has participated in the Don Bosco Communal Bank for over three years.  The eight members are very responsible people who work very hard in their businesses.  Their main objective, among others, is to give the best of themselves to their loved ones.

Zenón is a pensioner who worked in the mine for many years.  With the money that he received as severance pay he bought a piece of land, which he built on.  Later, he also got a car with the intention of renting it.  At first this business went well for him.  Later, he had to sell it because of an accident with his vehicle.  

Repairing it was very expensive.  Therefore, this time he bought a “motocarro” (three wheeled motorized vehicle).  So far he has not had any problems with it, and he performs maintenance on it every month.  The income from renting it is good.  It covers his family’s food expenses. It also pays for part of the education of his grandson, a mechanical engineer.   

The loan will be used for a small electrical shop that he will set up in his house, where he will help his son.  That is where they will fix cell phones, radios, and computers, among other things.  He needs the loan to buy accessories and replacement parts for this equipment.

loans.use: To buy accessories and replacement parts for mobile equipment and other things

loans.name: Mayra Guadalupe

texts.es:
a Sra.Mayra  es una persona que esta pencionada por discapacidad y depende
de su esposo ah tenido con nosotros 2 creditos mas en los cuales ah demostrado tener
muy buena cultura de pago esta muy contenta con el apoyo que fundacion le ah 
dado uno de sus proyectos puso el vitropiso de su casa es una persona muy humilde,
trabajadora y y en esta ocacion va poner el porton de su casa porque tiene una niña de 
8 añitos y quiere tener mas seguridad ya que para ella la seguridad de su pequeña hija 
es muy importante.
texts.en: Mrs Mayra no longer works because of a disability and is dependent on her husband.  She has had two previous loans with us and has been very reliable with her payments. She is very happy for the support which our foundation has given her.  One of her projects was to put down tiled flooring in her house.  She is a very humble and hard-working woman and on this occasion she is going to install a front door in her house because she has an 8 year-old daughter and she wants to keep her safe.  The safety of her small daughter is very important to her.

loans.use: To install a front door and lay a concrete slab

loans.name: Yader Enrique

texts.es: Yader Enrique de 31 años, es un padre de familia muy responsable y trabajador quien se ha esforzado al máximo para contar con su negocio propio. Él vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos. En su negocio José se encarga de vender mercadería en general en diferentes lugares, su venta está ubicada de manera ambulante, por lo que tiene que levantarse temprano todos los días para preparar los productos que ofrecerá a sus clientes. Yader solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda surtir su compra de sabanas, toallas, cosméticos y calzado de modo que pueda ofrecérselas a más personas.
texts.en: Yader Enrique is 31 years old.  He is a very responsible and hard-working father who has worked incredibly hard to have his own business.  He lives with his wife and two children.  In his business, José sells merchandise in different places in an itinerant manner which means that he must get up early every day to prepare the products which he will offer to his customers.  Yader is requesting a loan in order to stock up on his purchase of sheets, towels, cosmetics and footwear so that he can offer them to more people.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Josefa Ivania

texts.es: La Sra. Josefa Ivania E. S.  ella es Trabajadora activa del Colegio  público CERMA desempeñándose como Maestra de educación primaria tiene  treinta años de trabajar para el ministerio de educación es casada actualmente tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  seis créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Mrs Josefa Ivania E. S. works as an elementary school teacher at CERMA school.  She has been working for the Ministry of Education for 30 years.  She is married and has a school-age son.  She has had six loans from CEPRODEL and each one has been used for purchasing construction materials and improving her house.  She has greatly benefited from the CEPRODEL loans because they have enabled her to improve the living conditions of herself and her family.

loans.use: Purchase of building materials: sand, cement, quarry stone, surveyor's compass, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Noel

texts.es: El Joven Carlos Noel B. R., esta adquiriendo  crédito por primera vez en nuestra institución este crédito lleva con fin el pago de tramitación de titulo y trabajo logístico para defensa, ese joven trabaja en el Restaurante TIp-Top en atención al cliente es un joven con mucho deseo de superación y optimismo para llegar a obtener grandes metas.
texts.en:
Carlos Noel B. R. is a young man who is accessing credit for the first time with our institution. He plans to use the loan to obtain his professional qualifications and defend his thesis.

Carlos works in the Tip-Top Restaurant looking after customers. He is very eager to overcome any obstacles and is optimistic about reaching his goals in life.

loans.use: university expenses

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: vehicle repairs

loans.name: Aurelio De Los Santos

texts.es: El Sr. Aurelio de los Santos H. P.  él es ganadero tiene  cuarenta y tres años de dedicarse a esta actividad  es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  tres créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra ganado y este lo está solicitando para la compra de tres cabezas de ganado los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Aurelio de los Santos H. P. has raised cattle for 43 years. He is married. 

He has received three loans through Kiva partner CEPRODEL, each of which he has used to buy more cattle. He wishes to buy three more head of cattle with this loan.

The loans with CEPRODEL have greatly benefitted him, and he has managed to improve his own and his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy three cows

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubén D. V. R. es taxista actividad que realiza desde hace 6 años, en este momento el requiere de un préstamo para comprar las partes de su carro para arreglarlo pues se encuentra fallando por lo que  no quiere que el problema se agrave y le salga mas caro. Este negocio es su fuente de ingresos es por ello que pide el apoyo para poder seguir trabajando y ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rubén D. V. R. is a taxi driver and has been for the past 6 years.  He currently needs a loan to purchase parts to fix his car because it is not working properly.  He does not want the problem to get worse and end up costing him more.  This business is his source of income which is why he is asking for help so that he can continue to work and offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To repair his taxi

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es: La Sra. Juana Francisca A. N. ella se dedica  a la siembra de granos como frijoles, maíz etc,  tiene  diez años de dedicarse a esta actividad. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de insumos y granos para prepararse para la siembra los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Mrs Juana Francisca A. Narvaéz sows grains such as beans and corn.  She has been doing this for ten years.  She has had two loans from CEPRODEL and each one has been used to purchase supplies and grains to get ready for sowing.  She has greatly benefited from the CEPRODEL loans because they have helped her to improve the living conditions of herself and her family.

loans.use: Purchase of supplies, land rent

loans.name: Ovidio

texts.es: El Sr.Ovidio es un hombre muy luchador y humilde, actualmente el vende chicharrones para poder mantener a suhija ya que el Sr. es divorciado, y esta a su cargo su hija, y a el le interesa tener una mejor de vida, para poderle dar lo mejor a su hija y una vida mas comoda y poder superarse economicamente.
texts.en: Ovidio is a very hardworking and humble man.  He currently works selling ‘chicharrones’ (fried pork rinds) to be able to support his daughter since he is divorced and is responsible for her.  He wants to have a better life to be able to provide the best for daughter, as well as to have a more comfortable life and to move forward financially.

loans.use: To change the location of his business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es: El Sr. Juan José A. N. él se dedica  a la siembra de granos como frijoles, maíz etc,  tiene  quince años de dedicarse a esta actividad. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de insumos y granos para prepararse para la siembra los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Juan José A. N. works growing grains like beans, corn, etc. and has been doing so for fifteen years.  He has taken out two loans through CEPRODEL and has used each one to purchase supplies and grains to prepare for planting.  The CEPRODEL loans have benefited him greatly because, as a result, he has improved his living condition and that of his family.

loans.use: To purchase supplies and to rent land.

loans.name: Yara Lizeth

texts.es: La Sra.  Yara Lizeth G. P.  ella es Trabajadora activa del hotel Barceló Monte limar  desempeñándose como Asistente de recursos humanos  tiene  cuatro años de trabajar en esta empresa, es casada actualmente tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación, estos créditos con Ceprodel le han brindado la oportunidad de  mejorar su nivel de vida teniendo un techo digno.
texts.en: Mrs. Yara Lizeth G. P. is an employee at the  Barceló Montelimar Hotel.  She works as the Human Resources Assistant and has been working for that company for four years.  She is married and has a school-aged son.  She has had four loans with CEPRODEL and has used each one to buy construction materials for home improvements.  These loans through CEPRODEL have provided her with the opportunity to improve her quality of life by getting an adequate roof.

loans.use: Construction materials (sand, cement, stone)

loans.name: José Angel

texts.es: El Sr. José Angel A. N. él se dedica  a la siembra de granos como frijoles, maíz etc,  tiene  quince años de dedicarse a esta actividad. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de insumos y granos para prepararse para la siembra los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. José Angel A. N. works farming grains such as beans and corn.  He has worked as a farmer for fifteen years.  He has had two loans with CEPRODEL and has used them to buy fertilizer and grains to prepare for planting.  The loans from CEPRODEL have been of great benefit to him and have helped him improve his quality of life as well as his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to rent land

loans.name: Marvin José

texts.es: El Sr. Marvin V. es originario de la comarca Los Tololos del municipio de El Sauce, se desempeña como agricultor. Tiene cinco años de trabajar con Ceprodel y se le han otorgado 10 créditos para ganado y siembra. El crédito lo solicitó para la compra de insumos para la siembre de ajonjolí.
texts.en: Mr. Marvin V. is from the Los Tololos region of the municipality of El Sauce. He works as a farmer. He has been working with Ceprodel for 5 years and has received 10 loans from them for livestock and fertilizer.  The loan he is requesting is to buy fertilizer for planting sesame.

loans.use: Planting sesame

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: El Sr. Javier G. P. él se dedica a la siembra de granos como frijol  tiene  quince años  de dedicarse a esta actividad es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de insumo y preparación del terreno para la siembra los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia
texts.en: Mr. Javier G. P. has been growing beans for 15 years. He is married. He has received two loans from CEPRODEL, which he has used to buy materials to prepare and fertilize the soil before planting. The loans from CEPRODEL have greatly benefited him and have allowed him to improve his life and the life of his family.

loans.use: To buy materials for planting, fertilizing and preparing the soil.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.en:
Liliana is 24 years old.  She lives with her partner and young son in her own home in the neighborhood of La Victoria, just outside of the city of Chiclayo.  Her home has access to city water, but no sewer or septic system. This is common in her neighborhood as it is one of the poorer sections of the city of Chiclayo.

In the back yard of her home, Liliana raises animals such as ducks and chickens. She also manages a small vegetable stand in the market in Reque (a town about 20 minutes from Chiclayo). She sells vegetables, which she purchases from wholesalers or local farmers. She also sells her animals to local buyers there in the market when they reach the appropriate size.

This will be Liliana’s second credit with Edpyme Alternativa. She has proven to be a punctual and responsible borrower. She plans to use the current loan to purchase feed for her animals and expand her offerings of vegetables. She is thankful for the opportunity to access credit at a lower cost through Kiva funding.

loans.use: Expand her merchandise and purchase additional feed for her animals

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto tiene 49 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposo y a sus dos hijos en el caserío Hualtaco del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, aproximadamente a tres horas y media de camino de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura. El cuenta con un pequeño terreno de cultivo en donde ha instalado mango y limón. El cosecha estos productos y los ofrece en venta a las plantas procesadoras que se encuentran instaladas en la zona. Adicionalmente brinda servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros en sus tiempos libres, para ello cuenta con una mototaxi (vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para brindar servicio de transporte).

Roberto desea adquirir fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a sus cultivos y de ese modo asegurarse una buena cosecha. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 700 nuevos soles.

El es una persona responsable y que se esfuerza a diario para sacar adelante a su familia. Anteriormente ya ha tenido préstamos con Edpyme Alternativa y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus pagos.
texts.en:
Roberto is 49 years old, is married and lives with his wife and two children in the village of Hualtaco, in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, an area that is located in the Piura province, in the region of the same name. It is approximately 3 and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region. 

He works in agriculture. He has a small parcel of land where he has planted mango and lemon. He harvests the fruits and sells them to the processing plants in the area. In his free time he also transports cargo, as well as people, in his mototaxi (a motorized vehicle that consists of a motorcycle with a cabin attached in order to transport passengers or goods)

Roberto would like to purchase fertilizers in order to care for his crop and ensure a good harvest. That is why he has decided to request a loan from 
Edpyme Alternativa.

He is a responsible person who works hard every day to take care of his family. He has had loans with Edpyme Alternativa before and has always been punctual and responsible with his payments.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer in order to maintain his mango and lemon trees

loans.name: María Elizabeth

texts.es: La Sra. Elizabeth A. es originaria de la ciudad de León, actualmente se desempeña como odontóloga en el centro de salud del municipio de Santa Rosa del Peñón donde tiene siete años de laborar. Es el primer crédito que solicita para la compra de ladrillos y cemento con el objetivo de mejorar su vivienda
texts.en: Ms. Elizabeth A. is originally from the city of León. Currently she works as a dentist at the health center in the municipality of Santa Rosa del Penon, where she has worked for 7 years. This is the first loan she has requested and will be used to buy bricks and cement with the aim of improving her house.

loans.use: To buy bricks and cement

loans.name: Isidro Yader

texts.es:
El  Sr. Isidro tiene más de 26 año de laborar  en el MINSA de esta localidad.
Cuenta con su propia casa de habitación  la que piensa mejorar con el financiamiento otorgado por la institución. 
Esto le permitirá al cliente y su familia  tener  mejores condicione de vida.
texts.en: Isidro has over 26 years of experience working for the town’s Ministry of Health. He has his own home, which he is considering improving with credit provided by the institution (CEPRODEL). This will allow him and his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials

loans.name: Fátima Del Socorro

texts.es: La Sra. Fátima del Socorro M. G. ella es Trabajadora activa de la Alcaldía Municipal San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como Recepcionista, tiene  dos años de trabajar para esta institución es casada actualmente tiene un niño en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación los cuales los créditos con Ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Fátima del Socorro M. G. is married and has been working as a receptionist for the San Rafael del Sur city hall for the past two years.  She is married and has a school-aged son.  She has had two previous loans through CEPRODEL and has used each to buy building materials  to make improvements to her home.  This has benefited her because it has allowed her to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: Building materials

loans.name: Máximo Israel

texts.es:
El  Sr. M. tiene más de 27 año de laborar como técnico de enfermedades vectoriales en el MINSA de esta localidad.
Cuenta con su propia casa de habitación  la que piensa mejorar con el financiamiento otorgado por la institución. 
Esto le permitirá al cliente y su familia  tener  mejores condicione de vida.
texts.en: Senor M. has worked more than 27 years as a vector disease transmission technician with the MINSA in his locality.  He has his own home that he is planning on improving with the financing provided by this institution.  This will provide his clients and his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials

loans.name: María Isolina

texts.es:
La  Sra. Z.  es originario del municipio Santa Rosa Del Peñón departamento de León donde tiene más de 6 año de laborar como aseadora en el MINSA de esta localidad 
Cuenta con su propia casa de habitación  la que piensa mejorar con el financiamiento otorgado por la institución. 
Esto le permitirá a la  clienta   mejorar su  condicione de vida en la que vive junta con su familia.
texts.en: María is a native of Santa Rosa Del Peñón in the county of Léon where she has over 6 years of experience working as a custodian for the town’s Ministry of Health. She has her own home, which she is considering improving with credit provided by the institution (CEPRODEL). This will allow María to provide her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase of construction materials

loans.name: Nohemí

texts.es:
La  Sra. M. es originario del municipio Santa Rosa Del Peñón departamento de León donde tiene más de 15 año de laborar como secretaria en el MINSA de esta localidad.
Cuenta con su propia casa de habitación  la que piensa mejorar con el crédito que se le  otorgado  comprando los materiales indispensable para realizar las mejora.
Esto le permitirá a la clienta mejorar las  condicione en que vive su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. M. is originally from Santa Rosa Del Peñón, in the Leon department, where she has worked as a secretary for the MINSA (Ministry of Health).

She has her own home which she plans to improve with the money from this loan, by buying the necessary materials.  This will allow her to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: Building materials

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: La Sra. María Elena C. L. ella es Trabajadora activa del Hotel Barceló Monte limar desempeñándose como camarera, tiene  cuatro años de trabajar para esta institución tiene cuatro hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación los cuales los créditos con Ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: María Elena C. L. is a active employee at the Barceló Monte hotel who works as a waitress. She has been working there for four years. She has four school-aged children.  She has taken out two loans with CEPRODEL and each one has allowed her to buy construciton materials to improve her home. The loans with CEPRODEL have greatly benefited her, allowing her to improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: Buying construction materials: Zinc, beams, etc

loans.name: Ada Ruth

texts.es:
La  Sra. Ada tiene más de 13 año de laborar como enfermera en el MINSA de esta localidad.
Cuenta con su propia casa de habitación  la que piensa mejorar con el financiamiento otorgado por la institución. 
Esto le permitirá a la  clienta y su familia  tener  mejores condiciones en su casa de habitación.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ada has spent more than 13 years working as a nurse at the local MINSA [Health Ministry].

She has her own house which she is planning on improving with the loan granted by the institution. 

This will allow the client and her family to have better living conditions in her house.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials

loans.name: Kenia Julisa

texts.es: La Sra. Kenia Julisa G. C.  ella es Trabajadora activa del Hotel Barceló Monte limar desempeñándose como Auxiliar de Compras tiene  dos años de trabajar para esta empresa es casada actualmente. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación estos créditos con Ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera porque de lo contrario es difícil hacer este tipo de mejora en el hogar.
texts.en: Senora Kenia Julisa G. C. is an active employee at the Hotel Barceló Montelimar, where she works as a Purchasing Assistant. She has been working for the company for two years, and she is married. She has had two loans with [field partner] CEPRODEL and each one has enabled her to buy construction materials and improve her home. These loans with CEPRODEL have benefited her enormously because otherwise it is very difficult to make this type of home improvements.

loans.use: To buy construction materials: sand, cement, quarried stone, etc.

loans.name: Betiz Araceli

texts.es: La Sra. Betiz Araceli B. V.  ella es Trabajadora activa de la Alcaldía Municipal de San Rafael del Sur  desempeñándose como Secretaria tiene seis año de trabajar en esta institución. Ha tenido  siete  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y mejorar su casa de habitación, estos créditos con Ceprodel le han ayudado a mejorar el nivel de  vida teniendo techo digno para la unidad familiar.
texts.en: Señora Betiz Araceli B. V. is a hardworking employee of the San Rafael del Sur Municipal Authority, where she works as a secretary. She has been working for this institution for 6 years. She has had seven loans with [the field partner] CEPRODEL and each one has enabled her to buy construction materials and improve her house. These loans with CEPRODEL have helped her improve her standard of living, putting a decent roof over her family's heads.

loans.use: To buy construction materials: sand, cement, quarried stone, measuring tools, etc.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen T. is from the village of Magsaysay Saguday Quirino. She is 50 years old. Helen is married and has 2 adult-aged children. To make a living, Helen owns and operates a business venture in the food sector, making and selling food. While not the only means for generating revenue, the main source of income for the business comes primarily from making home frozen foods, banana chips, peanut butter and coated peanuts. Helen has been engaged in her business for over 20 years and earns approximately 4000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2008, Helen joined ASKI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Helen has successfully repaid a previous loan from ASKI. This previous loan was used to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. Helen is requesting a new loan of 15000 PHP which will also be used to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. This loan will be the 5th loan taken out by Helen from ASKI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

About ASKI:

ASKI is one of the most successful microfinance institutions in the Philippines. It has 29 branches covering the Central and Northeastern areas. Its clients are mostly farmers, fisherfolks and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: El Sr. Felipe B. A.  él es Trabajador activo de la Empresa ENACAL  desempeñándose operador de pozo  tiene  veinte años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente tiene un hijos en edad escolar. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción y  mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando  para ampliarle  su casa con un muro perimetral estos créditos con Ceprodel le han beneficiado mejorando sus condiciones de vida de la familia.
texts.en: Señor Felipe B. A. is a hardworking employee of ENACAL, where he works as a well operator. He has been with the company for 20 years. He is married and has one school-age son. He has had 4 loans with [the field partner] CEPRODEL and each one has enabled him to buy construction materials and improve his house. He is seeking this loan to extend his house with an exterior wall. These loans with CEPRODEL have benefited him, improving the family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy construction materials: sand, cement, quarried stone, iron, gravel, etc.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia C. is from the village of Magsaysay Saguday Quirino. She is 44 years old, married and has 4 school-aged children. Florencia owns & operates a general store where she sells a variety of products. She has been engaged in her business for over 5 years and earns approximately 3,500 PHP a month.

In 2008, Florencia joined ASKI to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 10,000 PHP from ASKI. This previous loan was used to purchase additional products to sell. Florencia is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. This will be her 5th loan from ASKI. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business. 

About ASKI:

ASKI is one of the most successful microfinance institutions in the Philippines. It has 29 branches covering the Central and Northeastern areas. Its clients are mostly farmers, fishermen and small entrepreneurs.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Napoleón Andrés

texts.es: El Sr.  Napoleón Andrés Tijerino Huembé  él es trabajador activo de la empresa hotel Barceló Monte limar desempeñándose como guarda de seguridad tiene un año de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  cuatro  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo  ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción para mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para compra de materiales y la compra de una lavadora,  los cuales los créditos con Ceprodel le han beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esa manera él ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Señor Napoleón Andrés Tijerino Huembé is a hardworking employee of the Hotel Barceló Montelimar, where he works as a security guard.
